job_title: Software Engineer
job_text: ['', 'GaN Corporation is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are pleased to consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, national origin, age, marital status, veteran status, disability, genetic information or any other legally protected classifications.\xa0GaN Corporation participates in E-Verify.', 'Mentor the next generation of engineers as GaN grows', 'Python', 'Mobile Platforms', 'Developing the appropriate applications per the design', 'Geeks and Nerds, as an employee owned company, believes the success of our corporation is directly tied to wellbeing and success of our employee-owners. With their dedication and innovation, our employee-owners contributes to the corporate success by exceeding our customers’ expectations. Our employee-owners are also the cornerstone of GaN’s community outreach programs to improve our neighborhoods where we work and live. We believe our employee-owners, customers, neighborhoods, and our country are collectively interrelated to improve the quality of life for us and our future generations. To expand our corporate mission, we are continuing to look for motivated employee-owners to join us at GaN. job_title: Senior Software Engineer
job_text: ['', 'Helping to write and get stories ready for execution', 'Designing and implementing APIs (we use GraphQL)', 'Examples of day to day tasks that we’d need you to help with:', 'Serverless technologies (AWS Lambda)', 'Perks:', '401k matching', 'We have fun.', 'We are agile. We are agile in the way we serve our customers and prioritize features.\xa0We are building software for the construction industry that is new to software solutions but is developing and changing rapidly, we must also be ready to change rapidly. We are agile in the way we run our business.\xa0We are continuously looking to experiment both with our product and the way we build the product to find better ways to do things. We are always willing to change course when better ideas are presented - no matter where they come from. We are agile in the way we handle our personal knowledge and development. DADO is an environment where everyone can be challenged and learn new things. There is no room at DADO for someone that is not willing to be challenged and learn.', 'At DADO, we understand that the complexity of buildings and construction processes are growing while schedules are shrinking. Effective collaboration and communication on the jobsite are critical to enabling successful projects and teams. Through deep industry expertise and hundreds of hours of one-on-one research with everyone from the apprentice to the architect, from the electrical contractor to the building owner, we have a deep understanding of the challenges that exist today, unique insights, and how technology can solve them. Our team combines extensive domain expertise in construction with a track record of successful, results-oriented innovation and entrepreneurship. Funded by the largest tool company in the world, with unparalleled market access and brand recognition, Team DADO is on the fast track to changing the way we build.\xa0Our mission is to break down the digital divides in the construction industry and empower every stakeholder to find and collaborate on the latest construction information.', 'GraphQL experience (client or server)', 'NoSQL databases (DynamoDB)', 'We build with the industry not for the industry. We have fantastic access to the construction industry which allows us to do the research needed to understand the problem before we start building the solution, and then aggressively deploy the build-measure-learn product development discipline. If there is a disagreement about which direction to go when building a feature or creating marketing messaging, the DADO team defaults to the question: "What did our customers say?"', 'We build with the industry not for the industry. ', 'Serverless technologies (AWS Lambda)GraphQL experience (client or server)NoSQL databases (DynamoDB)Graph Database experience (Gremlin)Experience training and using machine learning models', 'Membership to the Columbia/Mountain Hardware Outlet Store', 'Graph Database experience (Gremlin)', 'We take ownership. Some may call it “extreme ownership” or a GSD attitude. Lean-in, step-up, raise your hand, and find a solution to move us forward. We are a group of entrepreneurs willing to make decisions and take risks. This accountability also allows us to also confidently delegate when needed and trust each other to Get Stuff Done.', 'About the Role', 'Bonus points for:', 'Our Core Values:', 'Coaching other team members, building their skill sets', 'We are family first. ', 'Experience working in a series A startup environment', 'We are a full time remote company that is equally focused on building a great product and a great team culture.  DADO utilizes technologies like AWS, Elasticsearch, graph databases and machine learning to develop powerful products for the construction industry as rapidly as possible. We need a player-coach who is both excited about learning new technologies but who can also bring their breadth of experiences to help mentor and coach the rest of the backend developers.', 'Constantly learning new technologies', "We have fun. Yes, this is one of our core values and we take it seriously! We passionately believe in the industry's need for our solution and love working together to develop it. We make sure we schedule time to have fun together, with our customers and our industry partners on this journey. If you are not having fun working at DADO, we are doing it wrong and you need to speak up so we can address.", 'Advice and help with any home remodeling task!', 'We take ownership. ', 'Full time remote culture with flexibility in working hours', 'Discounts on DEWALT tools', 'We are agile.', 'Requirements:', 'A passion for Typescript and/or Python', 'Competitive pay and health benefitsFull time remote culture with flexibility in working hours401k matchingDiscounts on DEWALT toolsMembership to the Columbia/Mountain Hardware Outlet StoreAdvice and help with any home remodeling task!', 'We are family first. We are here to change the construction industry which is not a small task and not a 9-5 job.\xa0As a full time remote company, we value flexibility in schedule, but also realize there will be some early mornings, late nights, and working weekends along the way and we know that having a healthy personal and family life is what makes that possible and must be a priority. At DADO there might be a 9pm bug fix or late-night customer event but you will not miss a kindergarten graduation, a friend’s wedding or a birthday.', 'In depth knowledge of Elasticsearch', 'Enjoy working with microservices', 'Comfortable working remotely\xa0', 'DADO is headquartered in Oakland, CA but operates as a full-time remote company with employees across the US.', 'We are professionals. ', 'We are professionals. DADO was not started by three tech-bros in a garage, we are a group of professionals that are here to build a great company.\xa0We act with the highest level of integrity and respect in the way we interact with each other, with customers and with competitors.\xa0The entire DADO team holds themselves accountable to this in individual conversations and in groups. If you are looking for a company that is willing to cut ethical corners to get ahead, or a place where you can gossip about your coworkers - DADO is not the right company for you.', 'Designing and implementing APIs (we use GraphQL)Helping to write and get stories ready for executionCoaching other team members, building their skill setsPerform code reviews, providing constructive feedback', 'Excellent written and verbal communication', 'About DADO:', 'Experience training and using machine learning models', 'Competitive pay and health benefits', 'A passion for Typescript and/or PythonIn depth knowledge of ElasticsearchEnjoy working with microservicesExperience working in a series A startup environmentConstantly learning new technologiesExcellent written and verbal communicationComfortable working remotely\xa0', 'Perform code reviews, providing constructive feedback']

job_title: Data Scientist
job_text: ['', 'Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; and ', 'Experience of managing staff is preferred. ', 'Work with consultants and stakeholders in the field, as well as with 3ie staff, to ensure documentation of 3ie’s evaluation programs. ', '‘3ie Data Scientist’', 'Please apply by e-mail to jobs@3ieimpact.org, and include ‘3ie Data Scientist’ or ‘3ie Senior Data Scientist’ in the subject line. The applicant must provide, at a minimum, the following information: ', '5. Terms of Employment', 'Candidates should be available to start work as soon as possible. The salary range for this position is competitive and commensurate, based on location, qualifications and experience. Our policies and procedures reflect our commitment to safeguarding children and vulnerable adults from abuse. We follow a zero-tolerance policy for any form of bullying or harassment in the workplace. ', '\ufeffThe deadline for receiving applications is 25 September 2020. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and incomplete applications will not be considered. 3ie will contact the shortlisted candidates only.', ' Provide other technical assistance to key 3ie stakeholders as needed, on topics including but not limited to capacity development, evaluation methods and study design, database development, and evidence uptake and use; and ', 'Develop and test novel methods to improve the rigor and/or efficiency of impact evaluations and evidence synthesis; ', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with one to two years (or a Master’s with four to five or more years) of demonstrated experience in relevant fields, as applied to L&MICs; ', 'Please apply by e-mail to jobs@3ieimpact.org, and include ‘3ie Data Scientist’ or ‘3ie Senior Data Scientist’ in the subject line. The applicant must provide, at a minimum, the following information: A cover letter, not exceeding one page, highlighting your qualifications and experience relevant to the terms of reference; Curriculum vitae (not to exceed four pages); Work sample demonstrating one or more of the data science proficiencies listed above (e.g., a research paper or other technical document) that you alone authored/produced;Contact information for three professional references; and Please indicate in your cover letter if you have legal authorization to work in the United States or in India.', '3.2 Education and work experience for the DS position ', 'Experience with using version control management tools such as GitHub or Jupyter Notebooks; GitHub preferred; ', '3.2 Education and work experience for the DS position', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with five or more years (or a Master’s with eight or more years) of demonstrated experience as applied to L&MICs; Advanced expertise in data science methods, including data wrangling, exploratory analysis of large-scale datasets, statistical analysis, predictive analytics; Experience with spatial analysis and geographic information systems; Research experience and in-depth knowledge of experimental and quasi-experimental methods applied in impact evaluation (e.g., randomised controlled trials, instrumental variables, propensity score matching, interrupted time series); Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; Experience working with and presenting to high-level officials in funding agencies, international organizations, private foundations and government ministries; Experience with research transparency practices and open data; and Experience supporting new business activities and demonstrated ability to write technical proposals across one or more development sectors preferred. ', 'A cover letter, not exceeding one page, highlighting your qualifications and experience relevant to the terms of reference; ', 'Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; ', '3.Qualifications, experience, and skills ', 'Conceptualize, design, conduct, review, oversee, and/or quality assure impact evaluations employing these methods; ', 'Institutional advancement and communications', '2.1 Impact evaluation and technical assistance ', 'Engage in strategic growth and diversification of 3ie initiatives to cultivate donors, develop partnerships, write technical proposals, and support innovations in program development. ', 'Experience with research transparency practices and open data; and ', 'Excellent cross-cultural skills and diplomacy, and a reputation for being a strategic thinker, innovator, networker, and pragmatic problem-solver; and ', '2.2 Institutional advancement and communications ', '4. Eligibility', 'Contact information for three professional references; and ', '3.3 Skills ', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with five or more years (or a Master’s with eight or more years) of demonstrated experience as applied to L&MICs; ', 'Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the flexibility and willingness to adapt to shifting priorities and deadlines; ', '‘3ie Senior Data Scientist’ in the subject line', 'Curriculum vitae (not to exceed four pages); ', 'Proficiency in, and at least two years’ experience using, database programming languages such as R, Python, Matlab, or SQL (experience with Python data analysis libraries, such as, Pandas, NumPy and Bokeh/Matplotlib preferred); ', 'Lead and contribute to technical reports, publications, briefs, blogs, website content, and other social media on evidence programs and professional services; and ', 'Experience with spatial analysis and geographic information systems; ', 'Experience supporting new business activities and demonstrated ability to write technical proposals across one or more development sectors preferred. ', '1.Summary ', 'Represent 3ie in evaluation and development fora, including technical working groups and donor, bilateral, and multilateral consultative groups and meetings; Strengthen and build relationships with 3ie’s key stakeholders, including members, donors, policymakers and researchers; Lead and contribute to technical reports, publications, briefs, blogs, website content, and other social media on evidence programs and professional services; and Engage in strategic growth and diversification of 3ie initiatives to cultivate donors, develop partnerships, write technical proposals, and support innovations in program development. ', '3.1 Education and work experience for the SDS position ', '7.How to Apply', 'Research experience and in-depth knowledge of experimental and quasi-experimental methods applied in impact evaluation (e.g., randomised controlled trials, instrumental variables, propensity score matching, interrupted time series); ', 'A cover letter', 'jobs@3ieimpact.org', 'Provide technical and management leadership in the application of data science methods to impact evaluations and evidence synthesis, including through the use of data mining, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and big data; ', '3.3 Skills', 'Ability to carry out spatial analyses and mapping in ArcGis, QGIS (preferred), and/or other GIS software packages; ', '4. Eligibility ', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with one to two years (or a Master’s with four to five or more years) of demonstrated experience in relevant fields, as applied to L&MICs; Advanced expertise in data science methods, including data wrangling, exploratory analysis of large-scale datasets, statistical analysis, predictive analytics; Experience with spatial analysis and geographic information systems; Research experience and in-depth knowledge of experimental and quasi-experimental methods applied in impact evaluation (e.g., randomised controlled trials, instrumental variables, propensity score matching, interrupted time series); Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; and Experience supporting new business activities and demonstrated ability to write technical proposals across one or more development sectors preferred. ', '2.Key responsibilities ', '7.How to Apply ', 'The DS or SDS will provide technical and management leadership in the application of data science (including spatial data science) methods to impact evaluations and evidence synthesis, including through the use of big data and predictive analytics (e.g., data mining, machine learning, predictive modeling). The DS or SDS will lead and/or support the design, implementation, review, oversight, and quality assurance of impact evaluations employing these methods. They will also contribute to the development and testing of novel methods to improve the rigor and/or efficiency of the analysis. In addition, the DS or SDS will provide support in the preparation of proposal materials for fundraising, writing program documents and publications, reviewing grant proposals, managing external reviewers and consultants, and providing technical assistance for capacity building as needed. They will participate in high-level events, conferences, and workshops. In various capacities, the DS or SDS communicates and negotiates directly with funders and represents 3ie to policymakers and researchers. The successful candidate will have demonstrated expertise in data science, experience working in big data ecosystems, and familiarity with causal inference and impact evaluation, including experimental and quasi-experimental research designs, methods and the major applications and limitations of each. Page 2 of 4 Experience implementing research and translating research evidence for decision-makers in L&MICs is highly desirable. We are seeking a highly diplomatic and entrepreneurial individual who is comfortable taking initiative and who thrives in a matrix-managed, fast-paced environment. The DS or SDS will report mainly to 3ie’s director of evaluation. In the case of staff located in the Washington office, there will be a secondary reporting relationship to the director of that office. The DS or SDS may supervise and mentor junior staff. They will be working in a matrixed environment and will be expected to establish strong and collaborative relations with staff across all 3ie offices, with researchers and other stakeholders in the field and with 3ie members located in L&MICs. International and domestic travel is expected at approximately 10 to 20 per cent of their time, the situation permitting.', 'Strengthen and build relationships with 3ie’s key stakeholders, including members, donors, policymakers and researchers; ', 'We will recruit one or more individuals with the right to work in the US or India. 3ie is an equal opportunity employer committed to equality and diversity. We do not discriminate based on sex, age, religion, ethnicity, caste, sexual orientation or for being differently-abled. We particularly encourage ethnic minorities and differently-abled persons to apply. ', 'Please indicate in your cover letter if you have legal authorization to work in the United States or in India.', 'Experience working with and presenting to high-level officials in funding agencies, international organizations, private foundations and government ministries; ', '\ufeffThe deadline for receiving applications is 25 September 2020', 'Represent 3ie in evaluation and development fora, including technical working groups and donor, bilateral, and multilateral consultative groups and meetings; ', 'Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills in English; with professional proficiency in additional languages highly preferred;', 'Work sample demonstrating one or more of the data science proficiencies listed above (e.g., a research paper or other technical document) that you alone authored/produced;', 'Excellent teamwork skills as well as ability to take initiative and work independently as needed;', 'Lead teams in designing and implementing protocols for the collection, cleaning, processing, analysis, and interpretation of multiple different types of data sources, including machine-generated (e.g., fixed and mobile sensors, satellites), process mediated (e.g., administrative data, call record details), and human-sourced (e.g., social networks, crowd-sourcing); ', '3.Qualifications, experience, and skills', 'Provide technical and management leadership in the application of data science methods to impact evaluations and evidence synthesis, including through the use of data mining, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and big data; Conceptualize, design, conduct, review, oversee, and/or quality assure impact evaluations employing these methods; Develop and test novel methods to improve the rigor and/or efficiency of impact evaluations and evidence synthesis; Lead teams in designing and implementing protocols for the collection, cleaning, processing, analysis, and interpretation of multiple different types of data sources, including machine-generated (e.g., fixed and mobile sensors, satellites), process mediated (e.g., administrative data, call record details), and human-sourced (e.g., social networks, crowd-sourcing);  Provide other technical assistance to key 3ie stakeholders as needed, on topics including but not limited to capacity development, evaluation methods and study design, database development, and evidence uptake and use; and Work with consultants and stakeholders in the field, as well as with 3ie staff, to ensure documentation of 3ie’s evaluation programs. ', '5. Terms of Employment ', 'Proficiency in, and at least two years’ experience using, database programming languages such as R, Python, Matlab, or SQL (experience with Python data analysis libraries, such as, Pandas, NumPy and Bokeh/Matplotlib preferred); Experience with using version control management tools such as GitHub or Jupyter Notebooks; GitHub preferred; Ability to carry out spatial analyses and mapping in ArcGis, QGIS (preferred), and/or other GIS software packages; Excellent teamwork skills as well as ability to take initiative and work independently as needed;Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills in English; with professional proficiency in additional languages highly preferred;Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the flexibility and willingness to adapt to shifting priorities and deadlines; Excellent cross-cultural skills and diplomacy, and a reputation for being a strategic thinker, innovator, networker, and pragmatic problem-solver; and Experience of managing staff is preferred. ', 'Advanced expertise in data science methods, including data wrangling, exploratory analysis of large-scale datasets, statistical analysis, predictive analytics; ']

job_title: Data Warehouse Engineer
job_text: ['', '•\tCreate and maintain a corporate repository of all data architecture artifacts.', '•\tCollaborate within the direct team in accordance with Team Agreement, Definition of Ready, and Definition of Done.', '•\tFinancial Services industry knowledge preferred.', '•\tCreating and maintaining enterprise conceptual, logical, and physical data models.', '•\tData modeling tools such as ERwin, Toad Data Modeler, E/R Studio, etc.', '•\t7-10 years of experience with information technology programs and services, with at least 5 years demonstrated expertise in enterprise data management and related technologies.', '•\tWork as a cross-functional team member in an Agile setting to help complete and deliver the team commitments.', '•\tMaster Data Management (MDM) concepts and strategies for implementation.', '•\tProviding leadership and guidance with enterprise data strategies.', '•\tResponsible for reporting risks that are identified to the appropriate team and/or management. Additionally, responsible for managing, monitoring and reporting risks within the scope of your work area, to include, but not limited to Information Security risks.', '•\tBachelor’s degree in Analytics, Data Science, Data Management, Computer Information Systems, Computer Science or equivalent training and/or experience.', '•\tExpert T-SQL, SQL, PL/SQL.', '•\tGenerate visualizations of simple to complex processes.', '•\tEnsuring consistency between data management, enterprise storage and all other technical system components.', '•\tRegular and reliable attendance.', '•\tAble to explain technical concepts in a concise manner to non-technical users.', "We are seeking a talented Data Architect (Snowflake) to serve as a data management subject matter expert and is responsible for designing, creating, deploying and managing the organization's data architecture. The Data Architect Lead is responsible for ensuring the organization’s data assets are in line with the defined data architecture and with the goals of the business. In order to accomplish this, the data architect will work collaboratively with a cross section of technical and non-technical users.", '•\tKnowledge of emerging data managements trends such as NoSQL/Big Data, streaming data, etc.', '•\tExperience with Snowflake cloud data platform, web services, enterprise data management, information security, applications development, and cloud-based architectures.', '•\tUnderstanding of information systems and data life-cycle management best practices and methodologies, such as systems development life cycle (SDLC).', '•\tEvaluating and recommending new and emerging data management and storage technologies and standards.', '•\tAdvanced communication skills and customer relationship skills.', '•\tData management best practices and trends.', '•\tAgile development methodology and concepts.', '•\tFulfill the role in the spirit of the Agile Manifesto, with emphasis on delivery of incremental value with frequent iterations and feedback loops.', 'What You’ll Need To Succeed:', 'NO Third party agencies. ', '•\tRevising data dictionary definitions, governance practices, and standards.', 'What You Can Look Forward To:', '•\tAdhere to Agile principles and philosophies (Scrum or Kanban, as applicable) in fulfillment of the role.', '•\tCommon data architecture patterns such as entity-relationship and dimensional modeling.', '•\tMicrosoft Office – Word, Excel, Visio.', '•\tExpert knowledge of enterprise data management technologies, including database platforms such as SQL Server and Oracle, ETL tools, and SQL.', '•\tCreating data models that conform to existing standards and conventions.', '•\tSnowflake/Talend /Azure or AWS cloud.', '•\tCollaborate across teams and across business areas in the spirit of an Agile mindset.']

job_text: ['', 'Production experience with Spark, Python and SQL.', 'Perks', 'As a Senior Data Engineer, you’ll...', 'Growth mindset to learn new technologies, dive into unfamiliar problem domains and challenge assumptions.', 'We are a small but dynamic and passionate team based in San Francisco. Growth mindset to learn new technologies, dive into unfamiliar problem domains and challenge assumptions. Production experience with Spark, Python and SQL. ', 'Empathy and effective communication skills: you can walk in the shoes of and advocate for collaborators such as data scientists and product managers. You can explain complex technical issues to both technical and non-technical audiences.', 'Our team loves working at Lob because...', 'Health benefits for you and your dependent(s)', 'Develop and maintain data infrastructure, libraries and services with software engineering best practices.', '401K', 'Commuter benefits', 'Be one of the founding engineers on the data team and help build an inclusive, innovative, and unique culture.', 'Collaborate closely with data scientists, analysts and infrastructure engineers to translate business challenges into data architecture, pipeline and warehousing solutions.', 'Champion data governance, security, privacy and retention policies to protect end users, customers and Lob.', 'Coach and mentor fellow engineers.', 'Paid parental leave', 'Venture-backed by the most reputable investors in tech, we have the funding to invest in fast growth', ' Collaborate closely with data scientists, analysts and infrastructure engineers to translate business challenges into data architecture, pipeline and warehousing solutions. job_title: Senior Java Software Engineer - Build the "Healthiverse"
job_text: ['', 'Physical Requirements', '70% Desk/phone work', 'Expertise in open source libraries /frameworks', 'Qualifications', 'Delivering. We are committed to producing world class products. Being skilled at managing competing priorities, pivoting and adjusting quickly, and thinking about the big picture are keys to success.', '30% Standing/moving throughout the office', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join the team who loves to code and build first of kind, ground breaking applications that have been changing the way doctors and clinicians worldwide interact with and care for their patients.', 'A Problem solver:\xa0passionate about using technology to solve complicated problems, and harnessing the power of data to adopt new tactics to enhance efficiency and scalability', 'You will be part of a team building and operating highly scalable software using cutting edge technologies for a variety of devices. You will get to solve the most complex problems that arise in the areas of distributed computing and high volume transaction processing. Your code will reach thousands of doctors and touch the lives of millions of patients across the country.', 'An Innovator:\xa0who thinks outside the box to introduce new methods, ideas and products', 'Five plus years industry experience as software engineer working on Java, Javascript or mobile technologies', 'Coding: Our engineers, no matter what level, never go hands off. We think it’s important to be close to the code and be involved in the code review. We work with several different technologies. We are looking for a breadth of experience in languages like Java, Ruby and JavaScript; as well as familiarity with frameworks like Spring, React and Angular; and practices like TDD and continuous integration.Learning: Our engineering team is full of life-long learners. We are looking for people who have a growth mindset, stay up on their craft, and always keep an eye out for what’s next. This takes critical thinking, root cause analysis, and issue dissection with the team to come up with the best solution.', 'DrFirst is an innovative Health IT company with a mission to create user-friendly solutions so that doctors can treat their patients quickly, efficiently and safely. Over 220,000 healthcare professionals, 67,000 pharmacies and 60% of the healthcare IT vendors in the market depend on us every day to reduce clinical errors and improve patient outcomes.', 'Position Overview', 'Passionate about technology and coding', 'Mentoring: Teaching and coaching is an integral part of this role. We think it’s important to be close to the code and be involved in the code review. We work with several different technologies. We are looking for a breadth of experience in languages like Java, Ruby and JavaScript; as well as familiarity with frameworks like Spring, React and Angular; and practices like TDD and continuous integration.', 'A Trusted advisor:\xa0with strong leadership acumen who always strives to do better tomorrow than today, and continuously improve his/her team’s knowledge and skills', 'A Team builder:\xa0\xa0who enjoys recruiting and developing teams, attracting A-players from various disciplines', '\xa0']

job_title: Sr. Big Data Engineer
job_text: ['', 'Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.', 'Visa: H1B, GC or US citizens only', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.', 'Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc.', 'Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘big data’ technologies.', 'Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.', 'Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.', '3-6 months contract with extension ', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics.', 'Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.', '100% REMOTE', 'Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.', 'Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc.', 'Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc.', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', 'Qualifications for Data Engineer', 'A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.', 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.', 'Strong project management and organizational skills.', quantitative field. job_title: Data Warehouse Engineer (#SnowflakeDB)
job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with users to mock-up dashboards and proof of concept data models.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of three years of experience implementing dimensional data models (star schemas).', 'Here’s what you get:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design dimensional data models that satisfy data requirements and address ease of use and performance.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0GREAT benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tuition reimbursement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will enjoy working with some of the smartest engineers in Boise', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0WORK/LIFE Balance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on the latest and coolest technologies', 'We are working on an exclusive retained search for a Data Warehouse Engineer for our client an industry leader experiencing hyper-growth headquartered in Boise, ID.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Instantiate the dimensional data models on the Snowflake cloud platform.', 'The Data Warehouse Engineer gathers and interprets user analytics requirements, then transforms those requirements into dimensional data models. They collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and other data consumers within the business to gather and populate data warehouse table structures. The Data Warehouse Engineer implements dimensional models, from building the logical model to implementing the physical model and loading the data with ETL. The engineer makes big data easy through intuitive query writing, performance, and integrating BI tools. They run the full DW stack from design through implementation.', 'Data Warehouse Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fun, collaborative work environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extract use cases and requirements from data warehouse users.', 'Here’s what you bring to the table:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep experience with database optimizer paths and data warehouse performance features.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Charitable contributions and activities that make you feel like a better person', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building data warehouses on cloud infrastructure preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Regular team meetings and one-on-ones with your manager to make sure you are heard, and you are on track Career development and lots of internal promotion – this group is growing!', "Here's what you’ll be doing:", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience dimensional data modeling for data warehousing using star schemas or Snowflake schemas.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and build out monitoring and support elements to ensure data quality and timeliness.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BEER30s/Snacks -once COVID passes', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0yearly bonuses', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Matching 401k contributions']

job_title: Data Science Developer - Java ETL, Big Data  (Direct Hire)
job_text: ['ALTA IT Services has numerous direct hire openings for Senior Java Developers with Data Science Deployment and Machine Learning Enablement backgrounds to support a leading insurance customer. Work is being conducted remotely during COVID-19 Stay at Home Orders and will revert to on-site with partial remote options once restrictions have been lifted. Office locations are Chevy Chase, MD and/or Indianapolis, IN. ', 'Salaries will be market competitive and commensurate with experience. Excellent benefits package available. ', 'Experience with Machine Learning Algorithms, algorithm analysis and algorithm implementation ', 'Familiarity with Big Data technologies, open source tools, source control tools and concepts, e.g., Git ', '\xa0 ', 'Qualifications ', 'Qualifications', 'JAVA BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE ENGINEER - DATA SCIENCE DEVELOPMENT', 'As part of a dynamic business intelligence team, the developers will be responsible for implementing Predictive Model Services in a production environment; in addition to implementing enterprise-wide Machine Learning Deployment Platforms. The role requires proficiency in software design and Java development. Experience with Machine Learning techniques, Spark or Python is desired. The developers will participate in planning new projects, including work on both machine learning deliverables and the deployment frameworks that host them. In this role, the ability to build and maintain mission critical production software systems is a must. Ideally, the developers would also be prepared to contribute to areas such as Automated Machine Learning, ML interpretability, and Data Engineering. ', ' ', 'Experience with HBase, Hive, and HDFS, Microservices architectures, and Docker /Kubernetes container-based deployments ', 'JAVA BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE ENGINEER - DATA SCIENCE DEVELOPMENT ', 'ETL Experience ', 'Java Business Intelligence / Data Science Developer ', 'For consideration please contact Melissa McNally via mmcnally@altaits.com ', 'Proficiency in Java and object-oriented software design with at least 4 years of production experience ', 'Experience with distributed file systems and distributed computing (especially Apache Spark) ', "Proficiency in Java and object-oriented software design with at least 4 years of production experience Knowledge of software design patterns, Unix/Linux environments, and Spark or Scala Experience with Spring Framework and Restful web services ETL Experience Familiarity with Big Data technologies, open source tools, source control tools and concepts, e.g., Git Experience with Machine Learning Algorithms, algorithm analysis and algorithm implementation Experience with distributed file systems and distributed computing (especially Apache Spark) Familiarity with Python, Cassandra, date engineering and developing ADS's Experience with HBase, Hive, and HDFS, Microservices architectures, and Docker /Kubernetes container-based deployments ", 'Experience with Spring Framework and Restful web services ', 'Candidates must be eligible for direct hire without sponsorship. Individuals selected for hire must pass a pre-employment background investigation and drug screening. ', 'This position is not open for C2C\xa0 ', "Familiarity with Python, Cassandra, date engineering and developing ADS's ", 'Please include desired compensation with the resume.  ', 'Knowledge of software design patterns, Unix/Linux environments, and Spark or Scala ', 'NOT OPEN FOR C2C ', '\xa0', 'ALTA IT Services, LLC is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, gender, age, color, religion, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, or any other factor.']

job_title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
job_text: ['Excellent analysis and decision-making skills Qualifications ', '', "Ability to understand customer requirements documents Ability to design, code, debug, test and document embedded software applications and support Hardware Engineers. Excellent technical writing and communication skills Excellent analysis and decision-making skills Qualifications Bachelor's Degree Required -- Master's Degree preferred Minimum 8-12 years relevant work experience required US Citizen and must be able to obtain and maintain a DOD security clearance ", 'US Citizen and must be able to obtain and maintain a DOD security clearance ', ' This position may require exposure to information which is subject to US export control regulations, i.e... the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) or the Export Administration Regulations (EAR). All applicants must be U.S. persons within the meaning of U.S. regulations. ', 'Ability to design, code, debug, test and document embedded software applications and support Hardware Engineers. ', "Bachelor's Degree Required -- Master's Degree preferred ", 'Responsibilities:', ' ', 'We are looking for a highly experienced Senior Embedded Software Engineer to join us at our Peerless Instrument facility in East Farmingdale, NY. We are an industry-leading manufacturer of electronic assemblies, systems and software destined for the US military. We are looking for a creative Senior Embedded Software Engineer who has a passion to invent, solve problems and the curiosity to learn new ideas and technologies. We are seeking resourceful candidates able to overcome new challenges with creativity, innovation and tenacity. ', 'TI Digital Signal Processor assembly language ', 'This is your chance to join a dynamic team developing state of the art embedded software such as custom VPX based data acquisition cards and working with complex processor chips. Apply if you are a team player willing to share, collaborate and create. ', 'Curtiss-Wright values diversity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status. job_title: Machine Learning/Computer Vision Software Engineer
job_text: ['Aetrex’s technology ecosystem is a suite of products that provide authentic consumer benefits, and offer customized solutions for your foot type and lifestyle. We’re currently looking for a talented frontend developer for mobile apps and websites to join our technology team to assist in developing new products and enhance existing products. ', '', 'Experience with standard software develop practices and tools (Github, etc.) ', 'Good written and verbal communication skills in English. ', 'Qualifications: ', 'Software and algorithm development using 3D computer vision, image processing, machine learning, and data fusion for foot scanning devices and mobile apps. ', '\xa0 ', 'Prior experience with ML or Computer Vision for mobile apps (e.g., Core ML, Apple Vision, ARKit, ARCore) Prior experience with camera calibration, 3D reconstruction, point-cloud stitching, surface reconstruction and meshing Experience with AWS services Experience with OpenGL, WebGL Familiarity or experience with mobile development ', 'Compensation & Benefits: ', 'Develop and improve core algorithms for image processing of data for foot scanning devices and mobile apps. ', ' ', 'Successful candidates will have:', 'Prior experience with ML or Computer Vision for mobile apps (e.g., Core ML, Apple Vision, ARKit, ARCore) ', 'The Aetrex technology development team consists of a diverse group of programmers that work together to create exciting User Interface and Experience for our customers. For over 15 years we have developed software for scanners and mobile devices that have helped millions of people experience relief from unnecessary foot pain. AlbertOS is a new, groundbreaking operating system that runs the Albert and Gaitway scanning devices, and can be easily operated using simple voice or touch commands. Albert captures unmatched data and information about feet, enabling consumers to make more educated buying decisions when it comes to footwear and orthotic purchases. ', '• Competitive compensation package• For full-time regular employees,\xa0full benefits package including 20 Paid Time Off (PTO) days, Health Insurance, Dental/Vision, 401(k) plan with a company match, Long-term and Short-term Disability, FSA, Health Reimbursement Arrangement, Volunteer Days, Summer Fridays, and more.• Opportunity to grow and advance within a fast-growing company ', 'Demonstrated critical thinking and creative problem solving ', 'Nice-to-haves: ', 'Experience with OpenCV or other image processing libraries ', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Applied Mathematics, or related field 3+ years industry experience as software engineer building deep learning models and/or writing computer vision algorithms Strong programming abilities. Desired programming languages: Python, Objective C, C++ Experience with YOLO, Core ML, R-CNN or related deep learning models. Experience with OpenCV or other image processing libraries Experience with standard software develop practices and tools (Github, etc.) Demonstrated critical thinking and creative problem solving ', 'Aetrex is the global leader in foot scanning technology. Our very latest scanner, Albert, was created over several years by a team of leading engineers and programmers and represents a major advance in technology for consumers and retailers alike. This revolutionary 3D system joins Aetrex’s fleet of renown foot scanners, including Gaitway, Nova and Eclipse. ', "To watch Aetrex's recruiting video, please click this link: https://vimeo.com/337555857", 'Experience with OpenGL, WebGL ', 'Major Duties/Responsibilities:', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Applied Mathematics, or related field ', 'Familiarity or experience with mobile development ', 'Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer. ', '3+ years industry experience as software engineer building deep learning models and/or writing computer vision algorithms ', 'Compensation & Benefits:', 'Major Duties/Responsibilities: ', 'Sr. Mobile App Development Consultant ', 'www.aetrex.com ', 'Outstanding interpersonal skills and a can-do attitude, with strong collaboration skills and ability to thrive in a fast-paced, global environment. ', 'Software and algorithm development using 3D computer vision, image processing, machine learning, and data fusion for foot scanning devices and mobile apps. Develop and improve core algorithms for image processing of data for foot scanning devices and mobile apps. Contribute to Aetrex’s software development and implement innovative ideas to software application. ', 'Strong programming abilities. Desired programming languages: Python, Objective C, C++ ', 'Successful candidates will have: ', 'Entrepreneurial spirit who is willing to accept challenges and responsibilities. ', 'Sr. Mobile App Development Consultant', 'Entrepreneurial spirit who is willing to accept challenges and responsibilities. Outstanding interpersonal skills and a can-do attitude, with strong collaboration skills and ability to thrive in a fast-paced, global environment. Adaptability to work in a growing, dynamic team across countries. Good written and verbal communication skills in English. ', 'Contribute to Aetrex’s software development and implement innovative ideas to software application. ', 'Adaptability to work in a growing, dynamic team across countries. ', 'www.aetrex.com', 'Experience with YOLO, Core ML, R-CNN or related deep learning models. ', 'Qualifications:', 'Experience with AWS services ', 'Nice-to-haves:', 'Prior experience with camera calibration, 3D reconstruction, point-cloud stitching, surface reconstruction and meshing ']

Being skilled at managing competing priorities, pivoting and adjusting quickly, and thinking about the big picture are keys to success.', '30% Standing/moving throughout the office', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join the team who loves to code and build first of kind, ground breaking applications that have been changing the way doctors and clinicians worldwide interact with and care for their patients.', 'A Problem solver:\xa0passionate about using technology to solve complicated problems, and harnessing the power of data to adopt new tactics to enhance efficiency and scalability', 'You will be part of a team building and operating highly scalable software using cutting edge technologies for a variety of devices. You will get to solve the most complex problems that arise in the areas of distributed computing and high volume transaction processing. Your code will reach thousands of doctors and touch the lives of millions of patients across the country.', 'An Innovator:\xa0who thinks outside the box to introduce new methods, ideas and products', 'Five plus years industry experience as software engineer working on Java, Javascript or mobile technologies', 'Coding: Our engineers, no matter what level, never go hands off. We think it’s important to be close to the code and be involved in the code review. We work with several different technologies. We are looking for a breadth of experience in languages like Java, Ruby and JavaScript; as well as familiarity with frameworks like Spring, React and Angular; and practices like TDD and continuous integration.Learning: Our engineering team is full of life-long learners. We are looking for people who have a growth mindset, stay up on their craft, and always keep an eye out for what’s next. Open Source contributions and cross training opportunities are a way of life here.Problem solving: The problems we are solving are unique and complex. This takes critical thinking, root cause analysis, and issue dissection with the team to come up with the best solution.Mentoring: Teaching and coaching is an integral part of this role. We want people who want to share their experiences, best practices and knowledge to elevate the team as a whole.Delivering. We are committed to producing world class products. Being skilled at managing competing priorities, pivoting and adjusting quickly, and thinking about the big picture are keys to success.', 'What you will work on', 'A\xa0Collaborator:\xa0who can navigate internal departments and teams, brings people together to deliver world class products that accelerate DrFirst’s market share and profitability', 'Our culture is entrepreneurial, team oriented, collaborative, and fast-paced.\xa0We look for talented people who are passionate about developing world class software. If you want to build applications that save patients’ lives, we want to talk to you!', 'An Innovator:\xa0who thinks outside the box to introduce new methods, ideas and productsA Problem solver:\xa0passionate about using technology to solve complicated problems, and harnessing the power of data to adopt new tactics to enhance efficiency and scalabilityA Team builder:\xa0\xa0who enjoys recruiting and developing teams, attracting A-players from various disciplinesA Trusted advisor:\xa0with strong leadership acumen who always strives to do better tomorrow than today, and continuously improve his/her team’s knowledge and skillsA Driver:\xa0\xa0who works with purpose and passion; someone who will elevate our engineering team through new perspectives, ideas, and solutionsA\xa0Collaborator:\xa0who can navigate internal departments and teams, brings people together to deliver world class products that accelerate DrFirst’s market share and profitability', 'Learning: Our engineering team is full of life-long learners. We are looking for people who have a growth mindset, stay up on their craft, and always keep an eye out for what’s next. Open Source contributions and cross training opportunities are a way of life here.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline", 'Who will love this job', 'Problem solving: The problems we are solving are unique and complex. This takes critical thinking, root cause analysis, and issue dissection with the team to come up with the best solution.', 'DrFirst is an innovative Health IT company with a mission to create user-friendly solutions so that doctors can treat their patients quickly, efficiently and safely. Over 220,000 healthcare professionals, 67,000 pharmacies and 60% of the healthcare IT vendors in the market depend on us every day to reduce clinical errors and improve patient outcomes.', 'Position Overview', 'Passionate about technology and coding', 'Mentoring: Teaching and coaching is an integral part of this role. We want people who want to share their experiences, best practices and knowledge to elevate the team as a whole.', '70% Desk/phone work30% Standing/moving throughout the office', "Five plus years industry experience as software engineer working on Java, Javascript or mobile technologiesBachelor's degree in Computer Science or related disciplinePassionate about technology and codingExpertise in open source libraries /frameworks", 'A Driver:\xa0\xa0who works with purpose and passion; someone who will elevate our engineering team through new perspectives, ideas, and solutions', 'Coding: Our engineers, no matter what level, never go hands off. We think it’s important to be close to the code and be involved in the code review. We work with several different technologies. We are looking for a breadth of experience in languages like Java, Ruby and JavaScript; as well as familiarity with frameworks like Spring, React and Angular; and practices like TDD and continuous integration.', 'A Trusted advisor:\xa0with strong leadership acumen who always strives to do better tomorrow than today, and continuously improve his/her team’s knowledge and skills', 'A Team builder:\xa0\xa0who enjoys recruiting and developing teams, attracting A-players from various disciplines', '\xa0']

job_title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
job_text: ['Excellent analysis and decision-making skills Qualifications ', '', "Ability to understand customer requirements documents Ability to design, code, debug, test and document embedded software applications and support Hardware Engineers. Excellent technical writing and communication skills Excellent analysis and decision-making skills Qualifications Bachelor's Degree Required -- Master's Degree preferred Minimum 8-12 years relevant work experience required US Citizen and must be able to obtain and maintain a DOD security clearance ", 'US Citizen and must be able to obtain and maintain a DOD security clearance ', ' This position may require exposure to information which is subject to US export control regulations, i.e... the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR) or the Export Administration Regulations (EAR). All applicants must be U.S. persons within the meaning of U.S. regulations. ', 'Ability to design, code, debug, test and document embedded software applications and support Hardware Engineers. ', "Bachelor's Degree Required -- Master's Degree preferred ", 'Responsibilities:', ' ', 'We are looking for a highly experienced Senior Embedded Software Engineer to join us at our Peerless Instrument facility in East Farmingdale, NY. We are an industry-leading manufacturer of electronic assemblies, systems and software destined for the US military. We are looking for a creative Senior Embedded Software Engineer who has a passion to invent, solve problems and the curiosity to learn new ideas and technologies. We are seeking resourceful candidates able to overcome new challenges with creativity, innovation and tenacity. ', 'TI Digital Signal Processor assembly language ', 'This is your chance to join a dynamic team developing state of the art embedded software such as custom VPX based data acquisition cards and working with complex processor chips. As a member of our team, you will have continuous opportunities to learn and develop innovative solutions for customers worldwide. Apply if you are a team player willing to share, collaborate and create. ', 'Curtiss-Wright values diversity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status. If you require accommodation due to a disability at any time during the recruitment and/or assessment process, please contact Talent Acquisition  opens an email client application   and we will make all reasonable efforts to accommodate your request.', 'Xilinx Vivado Development Tools ', 'Minimum 8-12 years relevant work experience required ', 'Ability to understand customer requirements documents ', 'Excellent technical writing and communication skills ', 'C/C++ programming TI Digital Signal Processor assembly language Xilinx Vivado Development Tools TI Code Composer development tools Open VPX System and military software design ', 'C/C++ programming ', 'Skills/Experience:', 'TI Code Composer development tools ', 'Skills/Experience: ', 'Open VPX System and military software design ']

", 'Collaborate with different teams across Riot to incorporate customer feedback and provide elegant solutions', 'Our Perks', 'Be part of on-call rotation to help support the products', 'Knowledge within a diverse set of public cloud technologies: AWS RDS, S3, EC2, EKS, Lambda, Google Cloud Big Query, Google Cloud Bigtable, etc.', 'Comfortable working at the Linux command line', 'Required Qualifications', '3+ years experience in Python and SQL', 'Responsibilities']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Dynamics/.NET)
job_text: ['', 'The Care Center Technology organization operates in a tight-knit, collaborative environment.  IT, Systems Development, Product Management, Customer Care, Marketing & Sales all work closely together to align on supporting products and services in the areas of health, wellness, and security.  We also strive to maintain a strong bond and trust between our internal teams (architecture, development, test, configuration, and operations).  We encourage each other to work together and help one another make our work life at GreatCall more satisfying and rewarding.  This is a team that constantly looking for ways to improve our development operations through people, process, and technology.  This team also fosters a culture of innovation and encourages everyone to contribute through new ideas and insights ', '-Design and develop enterprise event driven platform services-Work closely with product owners, architecture and teams to lead feature implementation and source third-party solutions when appropriate-Coach and mentor mid-level Software Engineers -Implement and uphold standards and best practices around development processes, coding, and peer reviews-Optimize existing systems to improve performance and scalability through service/application tuning and code refactoring-Fully and properly test code to ensure the highest levels of reliability and maintainability-Research and recommend software solutions and tools that help fix inefficiencies in the development process, team collaboration, etc.-Help lead and drive development operations initiatives-Aid IT, CM, QA and support personnel as needed to troubleshoot lower environment as well as production issues-Other duties as assigned ', '\xa0 ', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0Director, Care Center Applications ', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS: Not applicable ', 'ABOUT THE TEAM: ', 'SCHEDULE:\xa0Standard business hours ', 'Preferred: ', 'DEPARTMENT:', ' ', 'Experience:', '-Skilled in technical spec, documentation writing, code commenting-Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies-Familiarity with Service Oriented Architecture-Familiarity with continuous delivery, processes, DevOps tools, Git preferred', 'LOCATION: \xa0Remote\xa0 ', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', 'RESPONSIBILITIES: ', '-Prior experience with Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Power Platform-Prior experience with development in the cloud (Azure, AWS, and/or GCP)-Prior experience with containerized event-driven microservices (Kubernetes, Docker, RabbitMQ, Kafka)-Prior experience with .NET Core preferred-Prior experience coaching/mentoring other engineers-Prior experience with design patterns and application design-Prior experience with continuous integration and deployment practices and pipelines-Prior experience with unit testing methods and test-driven development preferred ', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities: ', "Education:\xa0Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field of study preferred. Equivalent software development experience can be used in lieu of degree ", 'POSITION:\xa0Senior Software Engineer (Dynamics/.NET) ', 'SCHEDULE:', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Experience: ', 'ABOUT THE JOB: ', '-Minimum of 5 years of experience developing object-oriented applications-Minimum 3 years experience developing in .NET/C#-Strong experience designing and developing well-defined API based services-Strong drive to learn new technology-Prior experience with Complex Data integration problems-Prior experience with source control solutions such as Git or Mercurial-Prior experience with database design and technologies using SQL or NOSQL databases ', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS: ', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:', 'FLSA:', 'Required: ', 'DIRECT REPORTS:\xa0No ', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0Care Center Technology ', 'QUALIFICATIONS: ', 'LOCATION: ', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0Direct Hire ', 'Education:', 'FLSA:\xa0Exempt ', 'POSITION:', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:', 'You will be joining at an exciting time and will be a senior member a team rebuilding critical tools utilizing event-driven architecture. You can expect to work with technologies such as:  Azure, AWS, .NET Core, RabbitMQ, GraphQL, MongoDB and more. You will be counted on for complex problem solving as well as encouraged to recommend solutions.  You will have the unique opportunity to make a difference in people’s lives, developing and optimizing applications in support of health, wellness, and emergency response systems. Our customers and their loved ones depend on our products and services every day.  Your job will be critical to our success in meeting their needs! \xa0 ', 'DIRECT REPORTS:']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer
job_text: ['', 'Helping to write and get stories ready for execution', 'Designing and implementing APIs (we use GraphQL)', 'Examples of day to day tasks that we’d need you to help with:', 'Serverless technologies (AWS Lambda)', 'Perks:', '401k matching', 'We have fun.', 'We are agile. We are agile in the way we serve our customers and prioritize features.\xa0We are building software for the construction industry that is new to software solutions but is developing and changing rapidly, we must also be ready to change rapidly. We are agile in the way we run our business.\xa0We are continuously looking to experiment both with our product and the way we build the product to find better ways to do things. We are always willing to change course when better ideas are presented - no matter where they come from. We are agile in the way we handle our personal knowledge and development. DADO is an environment where everyone can be challenged and learn new things. There is no room at DADO for someone that is not willing to be challenged and learn.', 'At DADO, we understand that the complexity of buildings and construction processes are growing while schedules are shrinking. Effective collaboration and communication on the jobsite are critical to enabling successful projects and teams. Through deep industry expertise and hundreds of hours of one-on-one research with everyone from the apprentice to the architect, from the electrical contractor to the building owner, we have a deep understanding of the challenges that exist today, unique insights, and how technology can solve them. Our team combines extensive domain expertise in construction with a track record of successful, results-oriented innovation and entrepreneurship. Funded by the largest tool company in the world, with unparalleled market access and brand recognition, Team DADO is on the fast track to changing the way we build.\xa0Our mission is to break down the digital divides in the construction industry and empower every stakeholder to find and collaborate on the latest construction information.', 'GraphQL experience (client or server)', 'NoSQL databases (DynamoDB)', 'We build with the industry not for the industry. We have fantastic access to the construction industry which allows us to do the research needed to understand the problem before we start building the solution, and then aggressively deploy the build-measure-learn product development discipline. If there is a disagreement about which direction to go when building a feature or creating marketing messaging, the DADO team defaults to the question: "What did our customers say?"', 'We build with the industry not for the industry. ', 'Serverless technologies (AWS Lambda)GraphQL experience (client or server)NoSQL databases (DynamoDB)Graph Database experience (Gremlin)Experience training and using machine learning models', 'Membership to the Columbia/Mountain Hardware Outlet Store', 'Graph Database experience (Gremlin)', 'We take ownership. Some may call it “extreme ownership” or a GSD attitude. Lean-in, step-up, raise your hand, and find a solution to move us forward. We are a group of entrepreneurs willing to make decisions and take risks. This accountability also allows us to also confidently delegate when needed and trust each other to Get Stuff Done.', 'About the Role', 'Bonus points for:', 'Our Core Values:', 'Coaching other team members, building their skill sets', 'We are family first. ', 'Experience working in a series A startup environment', 'We are a full time remote company that is equally focused on building a great product and a great team culture.  DADO utilizes technologies like AWS, Elasticsearch, graph databases and machine learning to develop powerful products for the construction industry as rapidly as possible. We need a player-coach who is both excited about learning new technologies but who can also bring their breadth of experiences to help mentor and coach the rest of the backend developers.', 'Constantly learning new technologies', "We have fun. Yes, this is one of our core values and we take it seriously! We passionately believe in the industry's need for our solution and love working together to develop it. We make sure we schedule time to have fun together, with our customers and our industry partners on this journey. If you are not having fun working at DADO, we are doing it wrong and you need to speak up so we can address.", 'Advice and help with any home remodeling task!', 'We take ownership. ', 'Full time remote culture with flexibility in working hours', 'Discounts on DEWALT tools', 'We are agile.', 'Requirements:', 'A passion for Typescript and/or Python', 'Competitive pay and health benefitsFull time remote culture with flexibility in working hours401k matchingDiscounts on DEWALT toolsMembership to the Columbia/Mountain Hardware Outlet StoreAdvice and help with any home remodeling task!', 'We are family first. We are here to change the construction industry which is not a small task and not a 9-5 job.\xa0As a full time remote company, we value flexibility in schedule, but also realize there will be some early mornings, late nights, and working weekends along the way and we know that having a healthy personal and family life is what makes that possible and must be a priority. At DADO there might be a 9pm bug fix or late-night customer event but you will not miss a kindergarten graduation, a friend’s wedding or a birthday.', 'In depth knowledge of Elasticsearch', 'Enjoy working with microservices', 'Comfortable working remotely\xa0', 'DADO is headquartered in Oakland, CA but operates as a full-time remote company with employees across the US.', 'We are professionals. ', 'We are professionals. DADO was not started by three tech-bros in a garage, we are a group of professionals that are here to build a great company.\xa0We act with the highest level of integrity and respect in the way we interact with each other, with customers and with competitors.\xa0The entire DADO team holds themselves accountable to this in individual conversations and in groups. If you are looking for a company that is willing to cut ethical corners to get ahead, or a place where you can gossip about your coworkers - DADO is not the right company for you.', 'Designing and implementing APIs (we use GraphQL)Helping to write and get stories ready for executionCoaching other team members, building their skill setsPerform code reviews, providing constructive feedback', 'Excellent written and verbal communication', 'About DADO:', 'Experience training and using machine learning models', 'Competitive pay and health benefits', 'A passion for Typescript and/or PythonIn depth knowledge of ElasticsearchEnjoy working with microservicesExperience working in a series A startup environmentConstantly learning new technologiesExcellent written and verbal communicationComfortable working remotely\xa0', 'Perform code reviews, providing constructive feedback']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer
job_text: ['', 'US Citizen or Dual-Citizen', '3-5+ years of professional Software Engineering experience in a commercial production environment', 'The Engineering Team is searching for an experienced Senior\xa0Software Engineer to contribute in developing the next generation of our vision-based platform. The Senior\xa0Software Engineer is a full-stack engineer with proficiency in C/C++, DevOps, AWS and some UI/UX experience that works with Data, Engineering, Operations and the Product Teams to build our platform-independent system. As an integral part of the Engineering Team, the Software Engineer works with internal and external stakeholders to develop commercial ready software. The candidate needs to have hands-on, full-stack experience with the depth and breadth to evaluate complex environments and technology stacks. The Software Engineer needs to have a deep understanding of how to build, code, and maintain efficient services and solutions. As an expert in backend technologies as well as HTML5, JavaScript, and Node.js, the successful candidate will be using C++, AWS, Python, RESTful API, Docker, and more, in a DevOps, CI/CD, Agile Development Environment. The team uses Human-Centered Design approaches led by our talented Design team to implement highly modern, usable interfaces for Desktop, Web & Mobile. The candidate requires to interact with other team members to implement such interface designs into products. This position is full-time and for the right candidate, this is a fantastic opportunity to start as a core team member of a fast-growing, pioneering AI startup.', 'English Language skills both written and verbal', '3-5+ years of professional Software Engineering experience in a commercial production environment3-5+ years with C, C++, Python, and Java3-5+ years with web technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScriptExperience with Cloud Services such as Azure or AWSProficiency working with SQL and NoSQL databases.Experience working with minimum supervision and leading multiple projects simultaneously involving various groups/locations/vendorsUS Citizen or Dual-CitizenEnglish Language skills both written and verbal', 'Full stack development building high-volume, consumer-facing software working with a mix of back-end and client-side technologiesAbility to take a concept and turn it into a finished commercial productWork closely with our Product, Operations and Data Teams and build the next generation of productsMentor junior engineers', 'Experience working with minimum supervision and leading multiple projects simultaneously involving various groups/locations/vendors', 'Loko AI is pioneering Autonomous Systems using Artificial Intelligence. Our proprietary platform takes any video input and instantly provides actionable insights for risk management, security, surveillance, public safety and automation. Loko AI is located in sunny Irvine California – America’s Safest City for its size. Our team comes from top Universities, Fortune 500 Companies, and Hollywood Studios.', 'Full stack development building high-volume, consumer-facing software working with a mix of back-end and client-side technologies', 'Minimum Qualifications', '3-5+ years with C, C++, Python, and Java', 'Experience with Cloud Services such as Azure or AWS', 'Mentor junior engineers', 'Job Type: Full-time with Equity Package, Flexible PTO and Health Benefits.', '$100,000 - $145,000 per/yr.', 'Ability to take a concept and turn it into a finished commercial product', 'Work closely with our Product, Operations and Data Teams and build the next generation of products', 'Proficiency working with SQL and NoSQL databases.', '3-5+ years with web technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript', 'Responsibilities']

job_title: Software Engineer II / Developer - (Golang)
job_text: ['', 'Boulder, Colorado', 'We do a little bit of everything, and enjoy the outdoors. We enjoy taking on\xa0tough projects and making\xa0them work.\xa0We love discussing the latest technology,\xa0and how to use it day to day.\xa0', 'Located in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Boulder, Colorado, Spectra Logic provides a career and\xa0work experience second to none.\xa0Develop high quality solutions while gazing at the fabulous view; work out on your own or with our trainer at one of the on-campus gyms; grab lunch or snacks onsite or challenge the CEO to a game of pinball; and grow your career with peers who are second to none.\xa0Privately held since its inception in 1979,\xa0Spectra is allowed to do what is right without having to\xa0satisfy the analysts each quarter. That means our associates and customers come out as winners.\xa0', 'Can you see yourself here?\xa0', 'We are a driven group of engineers who show a high level of initiative and personal ownership of tasks.\xa0If you have these same qualities we’d really like to talk to you!\xa0\xa0', 'Ideal candidate will have experience with the following technologies:', 'Every line of code is reviewed; we expect you to take feedback and work well with others.\xa0You have a voice here, and you will have a major say in what takes place.', 'Testability and maintainability are super important to us; we care about our code and you should too.', 'If your software engineering skills are\xa0strong\xa0and you’re ready to\xa0have an immediate and direct impact on our product offerings, we want you, too!\xa0Spectra engineers are driven to develop faster, smaller, and more efficient digital data storage devices that preserve corporate and national treasures for more than a lifetime.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline.At least 2+ years Golang experience.', 'Application development using industry leading tools such as Go.\xa0', 'At least 2+ years Golang experience.', 'It would be nice if you had', 'Go, JavaScript, Full Stack Web Development. The focus will be on backend Go development with the possibility of switching between front end and back end development. C++ knowledge is an added plus.', 'We continually refactor\xa0code to be more efficient, testable, maintainable, etc.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline.', '*** Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to age 40 and over, color, disability, gender, gender identity, genetic information, military or veteran status, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, or any other applicable status protected by state or local law.', 'Comfortable working on any project with ability to jump from back end development (i.e Golang) to front end (i.e. Javascript).', 'We love taking on challenging projects that “can’t be done”, and making them happen.', 'Application development using industry leading tools such as Go.\xa0We are a driven group of engineers who show a high level of initiative and personal ownership of tasks.\xa0If you have these same qualities we’d really like to talk to you!\xa0\xa0Comfortable working on any project with ability to jump from back end development (i.e Golang) to front end (i.e. Javascript).Be able to successfully use design patterns to drive elegant architectures.Testability and maintainability are super important to us; we care about our code and you should too.We continually refactor\xa0code to be more efficient, testable, maintainable, etc.Every line of code is reviewed; we expect you to take feedback and work well with others.\xa0You have a voice here, and you will have a major say in what takes place.We love taking on challenging projects that “can’t be done”, and making them happen.', 'Be able to successfully use design patterns to drive elegant architectures.', '3+ years of previous work experience in C++ or other OOP languages a plus.', 'What you need to bring to the table', 'Status: Full Time', 'Isn’t\xa0it\xa0time you joined our winning team?', 'Software Engineer II / Developer - (Golang)', 'Why Spectra?', 'Employment Opportunities (EEO) Statement: Spectra Logic is committed to the practice and policies of equal employment opportunities in the recruitment, employment and promotion of all associates without regard to race, religion, sex, age, gender, minority, veterans, national origin or ancestry.\xa0', 'Who’s on\xa0your team?', 'Benefits: Spectra Logic provides a casual work environment, competitive salaries, and a compensation structure that rewards contribution and hard work. Our full benefits package includes 401(k), medical, life, AD&D, flex spending accounts, and company paid short and long term disability. Equal\xa0', 'Benefits', 'Employment Opportunities (EEO) Statement', '\xa0']
