job_title: Principal Software Engineer
job_text: ['', '  Acting as a lead participant in the architecture, design, development, testing, implementation, maintenance, and support of highly complex solutions   Working with the GCDS WebDev team to develop new applications, improve current systems and bring new capabilities to our customers   Being proactive when addressing issues concerning requirements, technical matters and when resolving production issues   Acting as a resource for teammates, collaborating with peers and performing tasks as an independent developer   Writing and maintaining our strong automated test suite, including unit, functional, integration, and end-to-end tests in our labs and QA environments  ', 'Are you a software developer who loves solving complex problems?', "  Have 12 years of relevant experience and a Bachelor's degree Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related engineering field; or its equivalent   Demonstrate experience with Ruby on Rails development including testing frameworks and web app administration tools (Apache/Nginx, Puma/Passenger/Thin)   Have experience working with relational databases (e.g. PostgreSQL) and/or key-value stores (e.g. Cassandra)   Have interest in building quality software products and architectures in an agile, rapid release, DevOps type environment using modern best practices   Have experience with or understanding of authentication/authorization concepts, technologies and protocols  ", ' Have experience with or understanding of authentication/authorization concepts, technologies and protocols ', ' Writing and maintaining our strong automated test suite, including unit, functional, integration, and end-to-end tests in our labs and QA environments ', 'Join our Custom Development Team', ' Does working on the security of Government organizations excite you? experience', 'Performance optimization: Automating processes, optimizing data delivery & re-designing the complete architecture to improve performance.', '\xa0Preferred Capabilities/Experience', 'Python developer preferred / desire to learn at an intermediate level or better', 'Preferred Capabilities/Experience', 'The selected applicant will serve as the Data Engineer for an integrated contractor team, supporting high-fidelity/high-resolution modeling of the Ballistic Missile Defense System (BMDS) in a virtualized, high-performance, high-capacity environment to provide Modeling and Simulation as a Service (MSaaS).\xa0The qualified candidate will be responsible for supporting the Integration, Test and Verification of large-scale data storage environments to support the Missile Defense Agency’s digital modeling/simulation programs. This includes working with many of the following technologies: data pipelines, data services, operational data stores, data warehouses, data marts, big data stores, data mining, big data visualization and experiment designs. The right individual will display both a passion for data science and leading a cultural change in how data is used throughout the organization regarding these efforts.\xa0Some travel is required.\xa0\xa0MUST HAVE OR BE ABLE/WILLING TO OBTAIN A U.S. SECURITY CLEARANCE.']

job_title: Principal Software Engineer I
job_text: ['', 'REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Hands on approach', 'The Spectrum brands (including Spectrum Networks, Spectrum Enterprise and Spectrum Reach) are powered and innovated by Charter Communications. Charter Communications reaffirms its commitment to providing equal opportunities for employment and advancement to qualified employees and applicants. Individuals will be considered for positions for which they meet the minimum qualifications and are able to perform without regard to race, color, gender, age, religion, disability, national origin, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'Thorough understanding of software engineering and object oriented design principles', 'Office environment', 'Familiarity with dependency management and build systems like Maven and Ant', 'Designs and Develops containerized microservices to be deployed to AWS using Kubernetes.', 'Implements software proposals.', 'Estimates scope of work.', 'Strong and current development experience in Java and web technologies', 'Creates project and architecture documentation as requested.', 'Related Work Experience', 'Defines enterprise level architectural solutions based on functional requirements and analysis documents.', 'Ability to take ownership and make technical decisions on software development projects', 'MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Experience working with open source software such as Spring, Google Guice, Guava, Tomcat, and NoSQL solutions', 'Actively and consistently support all efforts to simplify and enhance the customer experience.', 'Mentors and guides the work of technical staff to support their growth and achieve quality and consistency.', 'Tests and reviews system designs.', 'Agile experience', 'The health and safety of our employees and candidates is very important to us. Spectrum has adopted virtual mobile recruiting tools that allow us to continue meeting new candidates. We look forward to “virtually” meeting you.', 'Analyzes and revises existing system logic difficulties and documentation as necessary.', 'WORKING CONDITIONS', 'Ability to read, write, speak and understand English', 'Education', 'Designs and Develops RESTful and GraphQL based APIs for use by various front end/UI using Java technologies.', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience required.", 'Skills/Abilities and Knowledge', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Design, code, configure, test, debug, and document system and application programs to align with industry standards and best practices.', 'Java, Spring, Istio, Kubernetes, Google Guice, JPA/Hibernate, Databases (Relational and NoSQL), RESTful web services, GraphQL, AWS, Micro services, Netflix OSS, Jersey, SOAP web services, Axis, JMS, ESB’s, XML, XSD, XSL, JSON, HTML5, JavaScript, Apache open source libraries, Maven, Git, Eclipse/NetBeans/IntelliJ, continuous integration testing, shell scripting, Ruby', 'The Software Principal I position in the Data Platforms group is responsible for planning and implementing web service software to support Charter’s next generation products. This position will assist Charter to build features that will enable their customers to manage their account and access functionality and services that Charter provides', '8+ years of demonstrable in depth capability as a software engineer', 'Takes ownership and makes technical decisions on software development projects.', 'Experience with AWS, micro services, and Kubernetes tools', 'Develops and implements software according to proposals provided.']

job_title: Sr. System Engineer - VMWare, MCSE or CCNP Cert - U.S. Citizen
job_text: ['', 'Strong experience implementing and troubleshooting Windows, Active Directory, Microsoft SQL, Exchange/Office 365, Certificates and smart cards, and supporting services including DNS, DHCP and SCCM.', 'Working knowledge or experience with working with ticket- or incident- work order based tracking solution', 'VMWare Certified Professional (VCP) certification required.', 'Bachelor\'s Degree in Information Technology or closely related field required.VMWare Certified Professional (VCP) certification required.Either Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE) OR Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP) certification required.12 years of experience designing, implementing and troubleshooting enterprise class information technology systems.Possess or be eligible to attain a top secret clearanceBe a strong team player with a "can do" attitude, and adaptable to different administrative approaches.Strong experience implementing and troubleshooting VMware vSphere 5.x/6.x, Horizon View 6.x/7.xStrong experience implementing and troubleshooting Windows, Active Directory, Microsoft SQL, Exchange/Office 365, Certificates and smart cards, and supporting services including DNS, DHCP and SCCM.Provide after-hours on call support as required on a rotating schedule.Preferred:Experience implementing and troubleshooting core/closet switches, microwave wireless technologies, WiFi implementation, firewall rules, WAN connections and load balancers.Experience with Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) design, implementation and maintenance.Experience with monitoring systems such as SolarWinds.Experience implementing and troubleshooting storage systems. This should include implementing and zoning fiber channel switches, network attached storage devices, Microsoft NTFS permissions, file access auditing systems, SAN controllers, disk shelves, configuring data progression, de-duplication, site replication, provisioning volumes, and support of backup and disaster recovery.Working knowledge or experience with working with ticket- or incident- work order based tracking solution', 'Be a strong team player with a "can do" attitude, and adaptable to different administrative approaches.', 'Qualifications', 'Provide after-hours on call support as required on a rotating schedule.', 'Either Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE) OR Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP) certification required.', 'Experience implementing and troubleshooting core/closet switches, microwave wireless technologies, WiFi implementation, firewall rules, WAN connections and load balancers.', 'Preferred:', 'Experience with monitoring systems such as SolarWinds.', 'Experience implementing and troubleshooting storage systems. This should include implementing and zoning fiber channel switches, network attached storage devices, Microsoft NTFS permissions, file access auditing systems, SAN controllers, disk shelves, configuring data progression, de-duplication, site replication, provisioning volumes, and support of backup and disaster recovery.', 'Possess or be eligible to attain a top secret clearance', 'Experience with Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) design, implementation and maintenance.', 'Strong experience implementing and troubleshooting VMware vSphere 5.x/6.x, Horizon View 6.x/7.x', "Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or closely related field required.", '12 years of experience designing, implementing and troubleshooting enterprise class information technology systems.']

job_title: Data Warehouse Engineer (#SnowflakeDB)
job_text: ['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with users to mock-up dashboards and proof of concept data models.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of three years of experience implementing dimensional data models (star schemas).', 'Here’s what you get:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design dimensional data models that satisfy data requirements and address ease of use and performance.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0GREAT benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tuition reimbursement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will enjoy working with some of the smartest engineers in Boise', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0WORK/LIFE Balance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on the latest and coolest technologies', 'We are working on an exclusive retained search for a Data Warehouse Engineer for our client an industry leader experiencing hyper-growth headquartered in Boise, ID.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Instantiate the dimensional data models on the Snowflake cloud platform.', 'The Data Warehouse Engineer gathers and interprets user analytics requirements, then transforms those requirements into dimensional data models. They collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and other data consumers within the business to gather and populate data warehouse table structures. The Data Warehouse Engineer implements dimensional models, from building the logical model to implementing the physical model and loading the data with ETL. The engineer makes big data easy through intuitive query writing, performance, and integrating BI tools. They run the full DW stack from design through implementation.', 'Data Warehouse Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fun, collaborative work environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extract use cases and requirements from data warehouse users.', 'Here’s what you bring to the table:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep experience with database optimizer paths and data warehouse performance features.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Charitable contributions and activities that make you feel like a better person', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building data warehouses on cloud infrastructure preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Regular team meetings and one-on-ones with your manager to make sure you are heard, and you are on track Career development and lots of internal promotion – this group is growing!', "Here's what you’ll be doing:", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience dimensional data modeling for data warehousing using star schemas or Snowflake schemas.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and build out monitoring and support elements to ensure data quality and timeliness.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BEER30s/Snacks -once COVID passes', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0yearly bonuses', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Matching 401k contributions']

job_title: Data Scientist
job_text: ['', 'Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; and ', 'Experience of managing staff is preferred. ', 'Work with consultants and stakeholders in the field, as well as with 3ie staff, to ensure documentation of 3ie’s evaluation programs. ', '‘3ie Data Scientist’', 'Please apply by e-mail to jobs@3ieimpact.org, and include ‘3ie Data Scientist’ or ‘3ie Senior Data Scientist’ in the subject line. The applicant must provide, at a minimum, the following information: ', '5. Terms of Employment', 'Candidates should be available to start work as soon as possible. The salary range for this position is competitive and commensurate, based on location, qualifications and experience. Our policies and procedures reflect our commitment to safeguarding children and vulnerable adults from abuse. We follow a zero-tolerance policy for any form of bullying or harassment in the workplace. ', '\ufeffThe deadline for receiving applications is 25 September 2020. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis and incomplete applications will not be considered. 3ie will contact the shortlisted candidates only.', ' Provide other technical assistance to key 3ie stakeholders as needed, on topics including but not limited to capacity development, evaluation methods and study design, database development, and evidence uptake and use; and ', 'Develop and test novel methods to improve the rigor and/or efficiency of impact evaluations and evidence synthesis; ', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with one to two years (or a Master’s with four to five or more years) of demonstrated experience in relevant fields, as applied to L&MICs; ', 'Please apply by e-mail to jobs@3ieimpact.org, and include ‘3ie Data Scientist’ or ‘3ie Senior Data Scientist’ in the subject line. The applicant must provide, at a minimum, the following information: A cover letter, not exceeding one page, highlighting your qualifications and experience relevant to the terms of reference; Curriculum vitae (not to exceed four pages); Work sample demonstrating one or more of the data science proficiencies listed above (e.g., a research paper or other technical document) that you alone authored/produced;Contact information for three professional references; and Please indicate in your cover letter if you have legal authorization to work in the United States or in India.', '3.2 Education and work experience for the DS position ', 'Experience with using version control management tools such as GitHub or Jupyter Notebooks; GitHub preferred; ', '3.2 Education and work experience for the DS position', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with five or more years (or a Master’s with eight or more years) of demonstrated experience as applied to L&MICs; Advanced expertise in data science methods, including data wrangling, exploratory analysis of large-scale datasets, statistical analysis, predictive analytics; Experience with spatial analysis and geographic information systems; Research experience and in-depth knowledge of experimental and quasi-experimental methods applied in impact evaluation (e.g., randomised controlled trials, instrumental variables, propensity score matching, interrupted time series); Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; Experience working with and presenting to high-level officials in funding agencies, international organizations, private foundations and government ministries; Experience with research transparency practices and open data; and Experience supporting new business activities and demonstrated ability to write technical proposals across one or more development sectors preferred. ', 'A cover letter, not exceeding one page, highlighting your qualifications and experience relevant to the terms of reference; ', 'Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; ', '3.Qualifications, experience, and skills ', 'Conceptualize, design, conduct, review, oversee, and/or quality assure impact evaluations employing these methods; ', 'Institutional advancement and communications', '2.1 Impact evaluation and technical assistance ', 'Engage in strategic growth and diversification of 3ie initiatives to cultivate donors, develop partnerships, write technical proposals, and support innovations in program development. ', 'Experience with research transparency practices and open data; and ', 'Excellent cross-cultural skills and diplomacy, and a reputation for being a strategic thinker, innovator, networker, and pragmatic problem-solver; and ', '2.2 Institutional advancement and communications ', '4. Eligibility', 'Contact information for three professional references; and ', '3.3 Skills ', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with five or more years (or a Master’s with eight or more years) of demonstrated experience as applied to L&MICs; ', 'Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the flexibility and willingness to adapt to shifting priorities and deadlines; ', '‘3ie Senior Data Scientist’ in the subject line', 'Curriculum vitae (not to exceed four pages); ', 'Proficiency in, and at least two years’ experience using, database programming languages such as R, Python, Matlab, or SQL (experience with Python data analysis libraries, such as, Pandas, NumPy and Bokeh/Matplotlib preferred); ', 'Lead and contribute to technical reports, publications, briefs, blogs, website content, and other social media on evidence programs and professional services; and ', 'Experience with spatial analysis and geographic information systems; ', 'Experience supporting new business activities and demonstrated ability to write technical proposals across one or more development sectors preferred. ', '1.Summary ', 'Represent 3ie in evaluation and development fora, including technical working groups and donor, bilateral, and multilateral consultative groups and meetings; Strengthen and build relationships with 3ie’s key stakeholders, including members, donors, policymakers and researchers; Lead and contribute to technical reports, publications, briefs, blogs, website content, and other social media on evidence programs and professional services; and Engage in strategic growth and diversification of 3ie initiatives to cultivate donors, develop partnerships, write technical proposals, and support innovations in program development. ', '3.1 Education and work experience for the SDS position ', '7.How to Apply', 'Research experience and in-depth knowledge of experimental and quasi-experimental methods applied in impact evaluation (e.g., randomised controlled trials, instrumental variables, propensity score matching, interrupted time series); ', 'A cover letter', 'jobs@3ieimpact.org', 'Provide technical and management leadership in the application of data science methods to impact evaluations and evidence synthesis, including through the use of data mining, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and big data; ', '3.3 Skills', 'Ability to carry out spatial analyses and mapping in ArcGis, QGIS (preferred), and/or other GIS software packages; ', '4. Eligibility ', 'PhD in economics, data science, statistics, engineering, public policy, or other relevant social science with a significant quantitative analysis component with one to two years (or a Master’s with four to five or more years) of demonstrated experience in relevant fields, as applied to L&MICs; Advanced expertise in data science methods, including data wrangling, exploratory analysis of large-scale datasets, statistical analysis, predictive analytics; Experience with spatial analysis and geographic information systems; Research experience and in-depth knowledge of experimental and quasi-experimental methods applied in impact evaluation (e.g., randomised controlled trials, instrumental variables, propensity score matching, interrupted time series); Academic knowledge of and direct field experience with environmental, health, nutrition, and other social sector programming in L&MICs; and Experience supporting new business activities and demonstrated ability to write technical proposals across one or more development sectors preferred. ', '2.Key responsibilities ', '7.How to Apply ', 'The DS or SDS will provide technical and management leadership in the application of data science (including spatial data science) methods to impact evaluations and evidence synthesis, including through the use of big data and predictive analytics (e.g., data mining, machine learning, predictive modeling). The DS or SDS will lead and/or support the design, implementation, review, oversight, and quality assurance of impact evaluations employing these methods. They will also contribute to the development and testing of novel methods to improve the rigor and/or efficiency of the analysis. In addition, the DS or SDS will provide support in the preparation of proposal materials for fundraising, writing program documents and publications, reviewing grant proposals, managing external reviewers and consultants, and providing technical assistance for capacity building as needed. They will participate in high-level events, conferences, and workshops. In various capacities, the DS or SDS communicates and negotiates directly with funders and represents 3ie to policymakers and researchers. The successful candidate will have demonstrated expertise in data science, experience working in big data ecosystems, and familiarity with causal inference and impact evaluation, including experimental and quasi-experimental research designs, methods and the major applications and limitations of each. Page 2 of 4 Experience implementing research and translating research evidence for decision-makers in L&MICs is highly desirable. We are seeking a highly diplomatic and entrepreneurial individual who is comfortable taking initiative and who thrives in a matrix-managed, fast-paced environment. The DS or SDS will report mainly to 3ie’s director of evaluation. In the case of staff located in the Washington office, there will be a secondary reporting relationship to the director of that office. The DS or SDS may supervise and mentor junior staff. They will be working in a matrixed environment and will be expected to establish strong and collaborative relations with staff across all 3ie offices, with researchers and other stakeholders in the field and with 3ie members located in L&MICs. International and domestic travel is expected at approximately 10 to 20 per cent of their time, the situation permitting.', 'Strengthen and build relationships with 3ie’s key stakeholders, including members, donors, policymakers and researchers; ', 'We will recruit one or more individuals with the right to work in the US or India. 3ie is an equal opportunity employer committed to equality and diversity. We do not discriminate based on sex, age, religion, ethnicity, caste, sexual orientation or for being differently-abled. We particularly encourage ethnic minorities and differently-abled persons to apply. ', 'Please indicate in your cover letter if you have legal authorization to work in the United States or in India.', 'Experience working with and presenting to high-level officials in funding agencies, international organizations, private foundations and government ministries; ', '\ufeffThe deadline for receiving applications is 25 September 2020', 'Represent 3ie in evaluation and development fora, including technical working groups and donor, bilateral, and multilateral consultative groups and meetings; ', 'Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills in English; with professional proficiency in additional languages highly preferred;', 'Work sample demonstrating one or more of the data science proficiencies listed above (e.g., a research paper or other technical document) that you alone authored/produced;', 'Excellent teamwork skills as well as ability to take initiative and work independently as needed;', 'Lead teams in designing and implementing protocols for the collection, cleaning, processing, analysis, and interpretation of multiple different types of data sources, including machine-generated (e.g., fixed and mobile sensors, satellites), process mediated (e.g., administrative data, call record details), and human-sourced (e.g., social networks, crowd-sourcing); ', '3.Qualifications, experience, and skills', 'Provide technical and management leadership in the application of data science methods to impact evaluations and evidence synthesis, including through the use of data mining, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and big data; Conceptualize, design, conduct, review, oversee, and/or quality assure impact evaluations employing these methods; Develop and test novel methods to improve the rigor and/or efficiency of impact evaluations and evidence synthesis; Lead teams in designing and implementing protocols for the collection, cleaning, processing, analysis, and interpretation of multiple different types of data sources, including machine-generated (e.g., fixed and mobile sensors, satellites), process mediated (e.g., administrative data, call record details), and human-sourced (e.g., social networks, crowd-sourcing);  Provide other technical assistance to key 3ie stakeholders as needed, on topics including but not limited to capacity development, evaluation methods and study design, database development, and evidence uptake and use; and Work with consultants and stakeholders in the field, as well as with 3ie staff, to ensure documentation of 3ie’s evaluation programs. ', '5. Terms of Employment ', 'Proficiency in, and at least two years’ experience using, database programming languages such as R, Python, Matlab, or SQL (experience with Python data analysis libraries, such as, Pandas, NumPy and Bokeh/Matplotlib preferred); Experience with using version control management tools such as GitHub or Jupyter Notebooks; GitHub preferred; Ability to carry out spatial analyses and mapping in ArcGis, QGIS (preferred), and/or other GIS software packages; Excellent teamwork skills as well as ability to take initiative and work independently as needed;Excellent oral and written communication as well as presentation skills in English; with professional proficiency in additional languages highly preferred;Excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the flexibility and willingness to adapt to shifting priorities and deadlines; Excellent cross-cultural skills and diplomacy, and a reputation for being a strategic thinker, innovator, networker, and pragmatic problem-solver; and Experience of managing staff is preferred. ', 'Advanced expertise in data science methods, including data wrangling, exploratory analysis of large-scale datasets, statistical analysis, predictive analytics; ']

job_title: Sr. Big Data Engineer
job_text: ['', 'Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.', 'Visa: H1B, GC or US citizens only', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.', 'Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc.', 'Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘big data’ technologies.', 'Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.', 'Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.', '3-6 months contract with extension ', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics.', 'Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.', '100% REMOTE', 'Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.', 'Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc.', 'Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc.', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', 'Qualifications for Data Engineer', 'A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.', 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.', 'Strong project management and organizational skills.', 'We are looking for a candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the following software/tools:', 'Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift', 'Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.', 'Responsibilities for Sr. Data Engineer', 'Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions.', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture,', 'Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.']

job_title: Software Engineer / Architect
job_text: ['', 'Interest in software development with a strong customer      focus and requirements-driven design and development. ', ' Excellent health, dental, and vision insurance.  Revenue sharing and a 401(k) retirement savings.  Life, disability, and long-term care insurance.  Little to no travel.  Robust career development and extensive training.  ', 'Now, imagine yourself:  ', '\xa0 ', 'Eagerness for learning newer and varying technologies.', 'Designing, developing, and testing application code. ', 'Daugherty Business Solutions is an inclusive Equal Employment Opportunity employer that considers applicants without regard to gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, disabled or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ', 'We are looking for Software Architects and Software Engineers of all levels with a broad range of languages who can adapt to new client environments and learn new technologies quickly. ', 'Daugherty Business Solutions is an inclusive Equal Employment Opportunity employer that considers applicants without regard to gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, disabled or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Collaborating with DevOps, Release Engineering, and      Operation sot automate deployments. ', 'Enjoy helping others succeed… our clients AND our team members.', 'Solving problems using modern languages and frameworks.      ', 'Robust career development and extensive training. ', ' ', 'all levels ', 'Eagerness for learning newer and varying technologies. ', 'At a lot of organizations, it is hard to stand out in a sea of developers. Everyone is working on the same projects; creating and testing as fast and efficiently as humanly possible. Don’t get lost in the crowd. Team Daugherty offers developers the opportunity to work on something different. From one project to the next, engineers at Daugherty are constantly creating, testing and implementing solutions for our clients, and no two client projects are the same. With every project comes the unique opportunity to showcase your skills.  ', 'Excellent health, dental, and vision insurance. ', ' Interest in software development with a strong customer      focus and requirements-driven design and development.  Excitement to learn and work with technologies and      languages such as: Java, Javascript, GCP, C#, React, Node, Kubernetes,      Google Cloud, Vue, Spring, .NET, Azure, AWS, Angular, Python,      Microservices, Scala, Golang, TypeScript, HTML, SQL Server, Oracle, CSS      and more!!!  The list is limitless.  ', 'Being a member of an Agile team (standups, estimation,      iterative development CI, demos, retrospectives). ', 'Interested in joining our Team Daugherty? Here are a few things that we look for in a teammate: ', 'Interested? Then apply to Team Daugherty today and learn why working here satisfies the smart, the talented, and the curious. ', 'Excitement to learn and work with technologies and      languages such as: Java, Javascript, GCP, C#, React, Node, Kubernetes,      Google Cloud, Vue, Spring, .NET, Azure, AWS, Angular, Python,      Microservices, Scala, Golang, TypeScript, HTML, SQL Server, Oracle, CSS      and more!!!  The list is limitless. ', 'Little to no travel. ', 'Enjoy a fast-paced and challenging, but extremely collaborative team environment working to solve complex problems for our clients.', 'Working with business analysts to understand and      implement complex business functionality. ', 'Analyzing application specifications and technology      approaches to ensure business requirements are met and scalable for future      product releases. ', 'Enjoy a fast-paced and challenging, but extremely collaborative team environment working to solve complex problems for our clients. ', 'Bring a consultative mindset... looking for problems to solve and helping solve them together.', 'The recruiting process at Daugherty is a little different for every candidate. We want you to feel excited to join our team. We want you to be eager to take on a new challenge. We are always 100% honest about want to expect, because we don’t want Daugherty to be just another job. We want Daugherty to be your dream job. ', 'Managing a team of developers and analysts throughout      the entire product lifecycle. ', 'Creating well-designed, well-implemented data layers. ', 'Bring a consultative mindset... looking for problems to solve and helping solve them together. ', 'Revenue sharing and a 401(k) retirement savings. ', 'Passionate problem-solvers who are flexible, adaptable, and motivated full-stack developers. ', 'We offer members of Team Daugherty: ', 'Life, disability, and long-term care insurance. ', 'Enjoy helping others succeed… our clients AND our team members. ', 'Due to COVID-19, most of our employees are working remotely. We’ve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely. We value the safety of each member of our community because we know we’re all in this together. ', 'If you require accommodations or assistance to complete the online application process, please inform any recruiter you are working with (or send an email to careers@daugherty.com) and identify the type of accommodation or assistance you are requesting. Do not include any medical or health information in this email. The recruiting team will respond to your email promptly.', ' Designing, developing, and testing application code.  Solving problems using modern languages and frameworks.       Working with business analysts to understand and      implement complex business functionality.  Creating well-designed, well-implemented data layers.  Being a member of an Agile team (standups, estimation,      iterative development CI, demos, retrospectives).  Collaborating with DevOps, Release Engineering, and      Operation sot automate deployments.  Analyzing application specifications and technology      approaches to ensure business requirements are met and scalable for future      product releases.  Managing a team of developers and analysts throughout      the entire product lifecycle.  ', 'Due to COVID-19, most of our employees are working remotely. We’ve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely. We value the safety of each member of our community because we know we’re all in this together.', 'What are the most important attributes of software engineers on Team Daugherty? ', 'Passionate problem-solvers who are flexible, adaptable, and motivated full-stack developers.', '\xa0']

job_text: ['', 'You possess a rock solid knowledge of web languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and/or CSS) and backend JavaScript tooling (Node, Babel, Nginx, and/or webpack) is required.', 'You have a critical understanding for developing products with clear and intuitive UX/UI ', '\xa0', 'You have some experience managing day-to-day technical and design direction for production-level software is required.', 'You possess two to three years of industry experience in software development at a start-up or technology company.', '\xa0Python experience is a plus.', 'You have superb verbal and written communication skills ', 'Location:\xa0REMOTE', 'You will work and collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their needs and build and design innovative products to provide novel solutions.', 'Title:\xa0', ' ', 'Title:\xa0 Front End Engineer/ Product Manager', '\xa0You have been and are a successful software developer who is at the TOP of the team always wanting to LEARN/ INNOVATE/ EXPLORE/ and be CHALLENGED', 'Applicants must be authorized to work in the United States legally.', '\xa0You will be working in an established financial company designing, building, and managing front end technology infrastructure for quantitative financial research.', 'Location:\xa0', '\xa0You will be responsible for contributing your expertise to include new product ideation in collaboration with technology research, and contributing to core data visualization frameworks and front end code bases.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer
job_text: ['', 'US Citizen or Dual-Citizen', '3-5+ years of professional Software Engineering experience in a commercial production environment', 'The Engineering Team is searching for an experienced Senior\xa0Software Engineer to contribute in developing the next generation of our vision-based platform. The Senior\xa0Software Engineer is a full-stack engineer with proficiency in C/C++, DevOps, AWS and some UI/UX experience that works with Data, Engineering, Operations and the Product Teams to build our platform-independent system. As an integral part of the Engineering Team, the Software Engineer works with internal and external stakeholders to develop commercial ready software. The candidate needs to have hands-on, full-stack experience with the depth and breadth to evaluate complex environments and technology stacks. The Software Engineer needs to have a deep understanding of how to build, code, and maintain efficient services and solutions. As an expert in backend technologies as well as HTML5, JavaScript, and Node.js, the successful candidate will be using C++, AWS, Python, RESTful API, Docker, and more, in a DevOps, CI/CD, Agile Development Environment. The team uses Human-Centered Design approaches led by our talented Design team to implement highly modern, usable interfaces for Desktop, Web & Mobile. The candidate requires to interact with other team members to implement such interface designs into products. This position is full-time and for the right candidate, this is a fantastic opportunity to start as a core team member of a fast-growing, pioneering AI startup.', 'English Language skills both written and verbal', '3-5+ years of professional Software Engineering experience in a commercial production environment3-5+ years with C, C++, Python, and Java3-5+ years with web technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScriptExperience with Cloud Services such as Azure or AWSProficiency working with SQL and NoSQL databases.Experience working with minimum supervision and leading multiple projects simultaneously involving various groups/locations/vendorsUS Citizen or Dual-CitizenEnglish Language skills both written and verbal', 'Full stack development building high-volume, consumer-facing software working with a mix of back-end and client-side technologiesAbility to take a concept and turn it into a finished commercial productWork closely with our Product, Operations and Data Teams and build the next generation of productsMentor junior engineers', 'Experience working with minimum supervision and leading multiple projects simultaneously involving various groups/locations/vendors', 'Loko AI is pioneering Autonomous Systems using Artificial Intelligence. Our proprietary platform takes any video input and instantly provides actionable insights for risk management, security, surveillance, public safety and automation. Loko AI is located in sunny Irvine California – America’s Safest City for its size. Our team comes from top Universities, Fortune 500 Companies, and Hollywood Studios.', 'Full stack development building high-volume, consumer-facing software working with a mix of back-end and client-side technologies', 'Minimum Qualifications', '3-5+ years with C, C++, Python, and Java', 'Experience with Cloud Services such as Azure or AWS', 'Mentor junior engineers', 'Job Type: Full-time with Equity Package, Flexible PTO and Health Benefits.', '$100,000 - $145,000 per/yr.', 'Ability to take a concept and turn it into a finished commercial product', 'Work closely with our Product, Operations and Data Teams and build the next generation of products', 'Proficiency working with SQL and NoSQL databases.', '3-5+ years with web technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript', 'Responsibilities']

job_title: Staff Software Engineer - Teamfight Tactics
job_text: ['', ' Identify, prioritize, and implement new game systems and engine features, as well as performance improvements to existing game engine and rendering features Collaborate with discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve workflows while supporting in-game performance goals Reduce ambiguity in a problem space through technical discovery and prototyping Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation for relevant systems Form relationships with content creators Influence software engineering best practices within the team, including design reviews, coding standards, code reviews, tools improvements, source control management, and test/build/deploy processes Develop sustainable solutions, improving the engine and leaving it better than you found it ', 'Expertise in C++', 'Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines', " 8+ years game industry or relevant engineering experience Expertise in C++ Expertise in game rendering and engine performance profiling Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment  Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines Familiarity with iterative development methodologies like Scrum, Agile or equivalent experience Familiarity with game engine tools, workflows and content pipelines Desired Qualifications Mobile or multi-platform performance profiling a bonus Our PerksWe offer medical, dental, and vision plans that cover you, your spouse/domestic partner, and children. Life insurance, parental leave, plus short-term and long-term disability coverage are also available. Riot will support your retirement benefits with a company match, and double down on your donations of time and money to non-profit charitable organizations. Balance between work and personal life is encouraged with open paid time off, and a play fund so you can broaden and deepen your personal relationship with games.===It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. job_title: Senior Data Engineer, Content Data Engineering
job_text: ['', 'Thrive in a fast paced environment, and see yourself as a partner with the business with the shared goal of moving the business forward.', 'Be comfortable outside of your comfort zone - explore new tech, make your own tool, or find a new way to address an old problem.', 'Sharp communicator who can explain complex data problems in clear and concise language. ', 'Build code that is understandable, simple, and clean, and take pride in its beauty.', 'Data warehousing, data modeling, and data transformation. ', 'Experience with sourcing and modeling data from application APIs.', "Love freedom and hate being micromanaged. Given context, you're capable of self-direction.", 'Lazy in a productive way (find tedious work boring and would rather automate it).', 'Have strong beliefs that are weakly held you can deliberate, and hear, all sides of a discussion and adapt to new perspectives that emerge from it.', 'How to write complex SQL in your sleep.', 'Significant experience with ETL tech (Informatica, SSIS, etc) is very valuable, but expect to work in a distributed environment.', 'Passionate about data quality and delivering effective data to impact the business. ', 'MPP/Cloud data warehouse solutions (Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery, Vertica, Teradata, Greenplum, etc). ', 'Creatively explore how to use data to continually contribute to Netflix. Translate data questions into flexible methodologies that scale to answer broad problems across the organization.', 'Education Surprise us.', 'Motivated to explore new technologies and learn, and can do so without taking formal education.', 'Continually acquire new data sources to develop an increasingly rich dataset that characterizes content.', 'Charismatic, determined, curious, and industrious, and not just hardworking.', "Fully own critical portions of Netflix' Content data model. Collaborate with partners to understand needs, model tables using data warehouse standard methodologies, and develop data pipelines to ensure the timely delivery of high quality data.", 'Be a bridge between data engineering and the business, enabling insight that can empower better decision-making.', 'Python for scripting and automation.', 'Who Are We']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer/Architect (MERN) // Exciting Startup within Global Brand
job_text: ['', 'Fullstack Developer (eCommerce Team)', 'To fit this role, you need a solid backend background in a web environment, and to be passionate about what you do. You should have a can-do attitude and be willing to take on\xa0ownership\xa0of the code you write, and be\xa0responsible\xa0for critical bug fixes when they happen, in real-time.', 'responsible', 'Start from the kick-off with product and UX, and be on board all the way to deployment - this is a dev-centric environment in which you’ll be involved in all stages.', "Their fullstack developers are responsible for building store infrastructure and platforms that can easily be integrated with. They're also working with huge amounts of data on a massive scale, to serve our stores from multiple datacenters to every visitor on the planet.", 'You need to know architecture and design and realize there’s no one else to do it for you. You should be a real\xa0team player, someone who\xa0cares\xa0about the team goals and putting in the work to realize them. Since we move quickly around here, you’ll need to have a positive approach towards\xa0change\xa0and be willing to\xa0adapt\xa0in a dynamic environment.', 'change', 'Release your code to production on a daily basis - we work in CI/ CD methods.', 'The Opportunity', 'Their team is small and operates like a startup, with its own dev (FED and BED), product, UX, QA, analyst, ops, and marketing. The work you’ll do is key to their rapid growth.', "What They're Looking For", 'The startup is a place to grow and grow fast. They’re one of the fastest-growing products at the parent company, with a mission to help everyone sell anything online. To that end, They’re already delivering leading ecomm solutions to 500,000+ users all over the world, and we’re just getting started.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Be responsible for the design and architectural aspects of your work.', 'ownership', 'You need to know architecture and design and realize there’s no one else to do it for you. You should be a real\xa0team player, someone who\xa0cares\xa0about the team goals and putting in the work to realize them. Since we move quickly around here, you’ll need to have a positive approach towards\xa0change\xa0and be willing to\xa0adapt\xa0in a dynamic environment.Technical skills, Including MongoDB, Express, Node, React (MERN)', 'cares', 'Technical skills, Including MongoDB, Express, Node, React (MERN)', 'adapt', 'Join our clinet to make a direct and immediate impact on hundreds of thousands of online merchants worldwide who use\xa0our clients stores, as well as their customers. You’ll develop end-to-end advanced ecommerce solutions and infrastructure, and shape the future of eCommerce on a global scale.', 'Start from the kick-off with product and UX, and be on board all the way to deployment - this is a dev-centric environment in which you’ll be involved in all stages.Be responsible for the design and architectural aspects of your work.Release your code to production on a daily basis - we work in CI/ CD methods.Own, test, and deploy your code. Owning it means also waking up at night when something needs an immediate response.', 'Own, test, and deploy your code. Owning it means also waking up at night when something needs an immediate response.', 'team player']

Snowflake experience is a big plus.A solid understanding of dimensional modeling is required.Excellent communications skills and interpersonal skills to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams.Experience with data reporting tools (e.g., Tableau), data cataloging tools (e.g., Alation) and data logging/monitoring tools (e.g., Datadog) is preferred.Experience in the i-Gaming industry is a big plus.', 'Work with product owners and tech leads to implement high-quality, production-grade data pipelines and ETL processes.', 'What You’ll Do As a Senior Data Engineer', 'Excellent communications skills and interpersonal skills to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams.']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer
Data Warehouse Engineer
job_text: ['', '•\tCreate and maintain a corporate repository of all data architecture artifacts.', '•\tCollaborate within the direct team in accordance with Team Agreement, Definition of Ready, and Definition of Done.', '•\tFinancial Services industry knowledge preferred.', '•\tCreating and maintaining enterprise conceptual, logical, and physical data models.', '•\tData modeling tools such as ERwin, Toad Data Modeler, E/R Studio, etc.', '•\t7-10 years of experience with information technology programs and services, with at least 5 years demonstrated expertise in enterprise data management and related technologies.', '•\tWork as a cross-functional team member in an Agile setting to help complete and deliver the team commitments.', '•\tMaster Data Management (MDM) concepts and strategies for implementation.', '•\tProviding leadership and guidance with enterprise data strategies.', '•\tResponsible for reporting risks that are identified to the appropriate team and/or management. Additionally, responsible for managing, monitoring and reporting risks within the scope of your work area, to include, but not limited to Information Security risks.', '•\tBachelor’s degree in Analytics, Data Science, Data Management, Computer Information Systems, Computer Science or equivalent training and/or experience.', '•\tExpert T-SQL, SQL, PL/SQL.', '•\tGenerate visualizations of simple to complex processes.', '•\tEnsuring consistency between data management, enterprise storage and all other technical system components.', '•\tRegular and reliable attendance.', '•\tAble to explain technical concepts in a concise manner to non-technical users.', "We are seeking a talented Data Architect (Snowflake) to serve as a data management subject matter expert and is responsible for designing, creating, deploying and managing the organization's data architecture. The Data Architect Lead is responsible for ensuring the organization’s data assets are in line with the defined data architecture and with the goals of the business. In order to accomplish this, the data architect will work collaboratively with a cross section of technical and non-technical users.", '•\tKnowledge of emerging data managements trends such as NoSQL/Big Data, streaming data, etc.', '•\tExperience with Snowflake cloud data platform, web services, enterprise data management, information security, applications development, and cloud-based architectures.', '•\tUnderstanding of information systems and data life-cycle management best practices and methodologies, such as systems development life cycle (SDLC).', '•\tEvaluating and recommending new and emerging data management and storage technologies and standards.', '•\tAdvanced communication skills and customer relationship skills.', '•\tData management best practices and trends.', '•\tAgile development methodology and concepts.', '•\tFulfill the role in the spirit of the Agile Manifesto, with emphasis on delivery of incremental value with frequent iterations and feedback loops.', 'What You’ll Need To Succeed:', 'NO Third party agencies. ', '•\tRevising data dictionary definitions, governance practices, and standards.', 'What You Can Look Forward To:', '•\tAdhere to Agile principles and philosophies (Scrum or Kanban, as applicable) in fulfillment of the role.', '•\tCommon data architecture patterns such as entity-relationship and dimensional modeling.', '•\tMicrosoft Office – Word, Excel, Visio.', '•\tExpert knowledge of enterprise data management technologies, including database platforms such as SQL Server and Oracle, ETL tools, and SQL.', '•\tCreating data models that conform to existing standards and conventions.', '•\tSnowflake/Talend /Azure or AWS cloud.', '•\tCollaborate across teams and across business areas in the spirit of an Agile mindset.']

job_title: Software Engineer - C#, Unreal Engine, gaming
job_text: ['', "Would you like working on an agile team, developing training software that combines virtual and physical simulations?\xa0 Would you like being involved in the entire software development environment starting from the operating system?If so, we have an opportunity for you in our Patriot Fielded Systems and Validation Department in Tewksbury, Massachusetts on the Patriot Multi-Echelon Training (PMET) & Patriot Maintenance Training (PMT) software development team.  Patriot is the world's pre-eminent air defense system, and we are currently developing Patriot training software in support of new system capabilities.  Successful candidates will work with a team of software and systems engineers to develop and test these new capabilities.  We strive for technical excellence by drawing upon a diverse workforce whose knowledge base covers the complete spectrum of modern computer languages and platforms.As a Software Engineer II, you will be an integral part of the Patriot PMET & PMT software team, and will be involved in: ", 'Proven experience with software development techniques and tools (e.g., Clearcase, Visual Studio, Perforce, Unreal)Knowledge of gaming programming Experience with software testing and automation tools Experience with Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence Proven experience with C++ and C# software languages ', 'Bachelor’s Degree or better in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or Software Engineering ', 'C++ and/or C# programming language skills 2 + years of software programming experience Bachelor’s Degree or better in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or Software Engineering US Citizenship is required. The deliverable PMET & PMT products provide a mix of virtual and physical simulators to be used in a classroom setting.  You will learn how to configure the operating system to maximize the performance and integrity of the Patriot Training software. You shall be able to contribute to the entire software life cycle of Requirements, Design, Code, Unit Test, Integration and System Test.  The team works in a scrum development facility located in Tewksbury, MA. The job requires a well-disciplined engineer who is able to thrive in a dynamic environment and is able to work well in a team. job_title: Senior Software Engineer
job_text: ['', 'US Citizen or Dual-Citizen', '3-5+ years of professional Software Engineering experience in a commercial production environment', 'The Engineering Team is searching for an experienced Senior\xa0Software Engineer to contribute in developing the next generation of our vision-based platform. The Senior\xa0Software Engineer is a full-stack engineer with proficiency in C/C++, DevOps, AWS and some UI/UX experience that works with Data, Engineering, Operations and the Product Teams to build our platform-independent system. As an integral part of the Engineering Team, the Software Engineer works with internal and external stakeholders to develop commercial ready software. The candidate needs to have hands-on, full-stack experience with the depth and breadth to evaluate complex environments and technology stacks. The Software Engineer needs to have a deep understanding of how to build, code, and maintain efficient services and solutions. As an expert in backend technologies as well as HTML5, JavaScript, and Node.js, the successful candidate will be using C++, AWS, Python, RESTful API, Docker, and more, in a DevOps, CI/CD, Agile Development Environment. The team uses Human-Centered Design approaches led by our talented Design team to implement highly modern, usable interfaces for Desktop, Web & Mobile. The candidate requires to interact with other team members to implement such interface designs into products. job_title: Robotics Software Engineer - Motion Planning & Controls
job_text: ['', 'Develop clean software for motion planning & controls modules that sit at the core of autonomous driving systems and interface with all other key modules such localization, perception, and simulation.', 'Strong problem-solving skills and ability to learn.\xa0', 'Competitive health benefits', 'C++ (i.e. C++11, C++14, C++17)\xa0development experience in a Unix/Linux environment.\xa0\xa0', 'Robotics Software Engineers', 'Motional AD Inc. is an EOE. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. To comply with Federal Law, we participate in E-Verify. All newly-hired employees are queried through this electronic system established by the DHS and the SSA to verify their identity and employment eligibility.\xa0', 'Meaningful work that makes a difference in the world', 'Our team is commercializing a world-class driverless system. The Motional team is behind some of the industry’s largest leaps forward in the last decade, including the first fully-autonomous cross-country drive in the U.S, the launch of the world’s first robotaxi pilot, and operation of the world’s most-established public robotaxi fleet.', 'Collaborate with\xa0controls\xa0experts and experienced roboticists on cutting edge algorithms from design, prototyping, testing, deployment, to productization.\xa0', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.\xa0', 'Flexible and creative thinking.\xa0', 'Design and build robust and scalable codebase that enables rapid exploration and evaluation of different\xa0controls\xa0approaches and algorithms.\xa0', 'Use your\xa0top-notch\xa0software development expertise to inspire others to develop better software practices and principles.\xa0\xa0', '401K with matching contribution', 'Recognition for innovation and excellence', 'Use your\xa0top-notch\xa0software development expertise to inspire others to develop better software practices and principles.\xa0\xa0Develop clean software for motion planning & controls modules that sit at the core of autonomous driving systems and interface with all other key modules such localization, perception, and simulation.Collaborate with\xa0controls\xa0experts and experienced roboticists on cutting edge algorithms from design, prototyping, testing, deployment, to productization.\xa0Design and build robust and scalable codebase that enables rapid exploration and evaluation of different\xa0controls\xa0approaches and algorithms.\xa0Show initiative and be a valued team member in our innovative, fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment where cooperative teamwork is the norm.\xa0', 'Experience in motion planning such as behavior, navigation, lane-level, route planning, prediction. Or experience in motion controls such as trajectory optimization planning and model predictive control.', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.', 'Opportunities to give back to the community', 'Strategically formed by Hyundai Motor Group, one of the world’s largest vehicle manufacturers offering smart mobility solutions, and Aptiv, a global technology leader in advanced safety, electrification, and vehicle connectivity, Motional is fundamentally changing how people move through their lives.', 'Competitive compensation with bonus potentialCompetitive health benefits401K with matching contributionLearning and development opportunitiesDiscount programs with various manufacturers and retailersRecognition for innovation and excellenceOpportunities to give back to the communityMeaningful work that makes a difference in the worldRelocation assistance (if applicable)\xa0', 'Experience in safety-critical applications and hard real-time constraints.\xa0', 'Learning and development opportunities', 'Relocation assistance (if applicable)\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Robotics, or relevant field.\xa02-8+ years of software development experience.\xa0C++ (i.e. C++11, C++14, C++17)\xa0development experience in a Unix/Linux environment.\xa0\xa0Advanced knowledge of software engineering principles including software design, source control management, build processes, code reviews, testing methods.\xa0\xa0Experience in motion planning such as behavior, navigation, lane-level, route planning, prediction. Or experience in motion controls such as trajectory optimization planning and model predictive control.Experience in safety-critical applications and hard real-time constraints.\xa0Strong problem-solving skills and ability to learn.\xa0Strong communication and interpersonal skills.\xa0Flexible and creative thinking.\xa0Python/Matlab experience is a plus.', 'Advanced knowledge of software engineering principles including software design, source control management, build processes, code reviews, testing methods.\xa0\xa0', 'Competitive compensation with bonus potential', "What You'll Do:", '2-8+ years of software development experience.\xa0', 'Python/Matlab experience is a plus.', 'Show initiative and be a valued team member in our innovative, fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment where cooperative teamwork is the norm.\xa0', 'Discount programs with various manufacturers and retailers', 'Additional benefits/perks:', 'About This Position', 'Our Robotics Software Engineers play a key role in making the vehicle of the future a reality by developing technologies that deliver a turnkey, fully autonomous driving system for our customers. Do you enjoy the challenge of working in a complex and growing system where new features are being added and evaluated rapidly? Do you enjoy mentoring and working closely with research scientists and engineers to bring ground breaking algorithms from concept to prototype and then from prototype to a product deployed in the real world at scale? If the answers are yes, we’re looking for you.', 'Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Robotics, or relevant field.\xa0', "What You'll Bring:"]

job_title: Senior Software Engineer
job_text: ['', 'We are seeking a resourceful, team-oriented Senior (Level III) Software Engineer to be responsible for developing technical requirements, designing enterprise software architecture and implementation for the Cloud, gateway and IoT devices, database design & maintenance and technical support to internal & external customers/end-users.', 'This job is located in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Local candidates preferred. ', 'The Phoenix Company is a rapidly growing 128-year-old company based out of Milwaukee, WI that specializes in the design and manufacture of specialty lighting in both industrial and performance architectural markets.\xa0', 'Software Engineer', 'Work with the latest approaches to creating scalable storage solutions for our applications (AWS RDS, Redis, S3, DynamoDB, etc.)', 'Software Engineer Responsibilities include:\xa0', 'Design enterprise cloud technical strategy and cloud solution architecture', 'Requirements include:\xa0', 'Perform duties of system support engineer, providing technical support for internal customer support and sales team as well as to the end-users.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent Minimum of 3-5+ years of experience in enterprise software development and maintenance Experience working with cloud services, database servers, networking, wireless controls, and gateway devicesExperience in general application lighting and controls related field is a plus.This job is located in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Local candidates preferred. US Work Authorization is required.', 'Experience working with cloud services, database servers, networking, wireless controls, and gateway devices', 'Actively monitor application performance and maintain system up time, while troubleshooting customer reported software bugs from external support teams.', 'US Work Authorization is required.', 'Design and deploy scalable and highly available services on AWS', 'Description', 'Software design, implementation, and maintenance of all levels of the full application stack from front-end to back-endCreate cloud-native application for deployment in AWS that will utilize resources such as API Gateway, Lambda, EC2, S3, and RDS.Create software architecture, design, and deploy reusable software components that meets functional, performance, scalability, and reliability requirementsDesign enterprise cloud technical strategy and cloud solution architectureDesign and deploy scalable and highly available services on AWSPerform enterprise software maintenance, database design and maintenance.Administrate existing databases and data infrastructure (backups, indexing, capacity planning, deployments, etc.).Work with the latest approaches to creating scalable storage solutions for our applications (AWS RDS, Redis, S3, DynamoDB, etc.)Actively monitor application performance and maintain system up time, while troubleshooting customer reported software bugs from external support teams.Perform duties of system support engineer, providing technical support for internal customer support and sales team as well as to the end-users.Versatile with multiple programming languages such as Java, PHP, Python, SQL, etc.Work with project management to provide cost estimate and timelines for deliverables.', 'Perform enterprise software maintenance, database design and maintenance.', 'Phoenix upholds the Equal Employment Opportunity for Women/Minorities/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities. If you need accommodations due to a disability to complete the application process, please contact the HR Director at +1 414.973.3453', 'Minimum of 3-5+ years of experience in enterprise software development and maintenance ', 'www.phoenixcompany.com\xa0', 'Experience in general application lighting and controls related field is a plus.', 'Create software architecture, design, and deploy reusable software components that meets functional, performance, scalability, and reliability requirements', 'Versatile with multiple programming languages such as Java, PHP, Python, SQL, etc.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent ', 'for the Cloud, gateway and IoT devices', 'Create cloud-native application for deployment in AWS that will utilize resources such as API Gateway, Lambda, EC2, S3, and RDS.', 'Administrate existing databases and data infrastructure (backups, indexing, capacity planning, deployments, etc.).', 'Software design, implementation, and maintenance of all levels of the full application stack from front-end to back-end', 'Work with project management to provide cost estimate and timelines for deliverables.']

That’s no easy task, which is why we’re so dedicated to building a winning team. And make no mistake, we are here to win, but we believe in winning right. job_title: Principal Software Engineer
job_text: ['', '1. Building an API gateway to serve data generated at different physical labs.', 'Our tests are powered by an automated sequencing lab and software that truly covers the full technology stack: robotics, automation, scientific compute, data pipelines, variant calling/interpretation (bioinformatics), data visualization, risk calculations (population genetics), electronic medical records (EMR), patient and doctor user experience (UX), and solving key workflow problems in large complex health systems. This technology stack enables us to provide actionable information to almost a million patients per year.', 'About you', 'Here are some recent projects that software engineers on the genomics team have worked on:', '4. Improving our patient risk calculation by incorporating new types of data.', 'Each patient sample can contain thousands of mutations. The genomics team is charged with the clinical interpretation of these mutations – going from those thousands to the few that cause rare diseases, predispose you to elevated cancer risks or challenge the health of your pregnancy.', '· Proficient user of Unix, Git, Docker and a cloud computing platform. We use AWS.', 'The software you write, above all else, ensures accurate results for patients but also enables us to accomplish this goal at scale. Because this task is not a pure software problem our team is inherently interdisciplinary. Strong software engineering fundamentals are essential but so is the ability collaborate with our genetic counselors, scientists, laboratory directors and many other groups.', 'Myriad is a genetic screening and testing company. Our genetic screens provide actionable information, empowering women and their families to make critical and timely healthcare decisions, whether they’re thinking about starting a family or evaluating risk for cancer. Find out more at www.myriadwomenshealth.com', 'About Us', '5. Developing an ETL pipeline to compute mutation frequencies across all mutations that we’ve sequenced and updating those values in real time as we sequence new patients.', '· 9+ years of software engineering in industry or academia under your belt as demonstrated by prior experience, GitHub account or personal web page.', 'Please answer all questions completely. Please do not provide any information not specifically requested on this Employment Application form.', '· Proficient with a relational database system. We predominantly use PostgreSQL.', 'If you’re interested in working with a modern tech stack, brilliant coworkers and products that influence millions of people’s lives, this is the place for you.', '6. Integrating a new external data source into our clinical interpretation pipeline.', 'WE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER. Applicants and employees are considered for positions and are evaluated without regard to mental or physical disability, race, color, religion, gender,national origin, age, genetic information, military or veteran status, sexual orientation, marital status or any other protected Federal, State/Province or Local status unrelated to the performance of the work involved.', 'engineers alike, are constantly learning, and are willing to work through ambiguity to deliver the best solutions for patients and healthcare providers.', '2. Publicly sharing mutations that we have classified.', 'A genomics background is not required! Solving these problems fundamentally requires software solutions. We’re looking for great software engineers – strong generalists with solid CS fundamentals and practical software engineering intuition – to help us scale up genomics to millions of users. Engineers who thrive here love collaborating with both engineers and non-', 'Job Description', 'Demonstrated ability to work in a collaborative environment with folks from different professional backgrounds.', 'About the position', '3. Automating time consuming and clinically critical processes performed by our laboratory directors.', '· Proficient with a high level language and web framework. We use a Python/Django/React stack.', '\xa0', "Myriad Genetics Inc., is a leading personalized medicine company dedicated to being a trusted advisor transforming patient lives worldwide with pioneering molecular diagnostics. Myriad discovers and commercializes molecular diagnostic tests that: determine the risk of developing disease, accurately diagnose disease, assess the risk of disease progression, and guide treatment decisions across six major medical specialties where molecular diagnostics can significantly improve patient care and lower healthcare costs. Myriad is focused on three strategic imperatives: maintaining leadership in an expanding hereditary cancer market, diversifying its product portfolio through the introduction of new products and increasing the revenue contribution from international markets. For more information on how Myriad is making a difference, please visit the Company's website: www.myriad.com ."]

Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals. Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies. Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems. ', 'Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews.', ' Knowledge of artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc. ', 'Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting.', 'Senior Software Engineer (Gameplay / Gameplay Tools) on the Merchant Guild team', 'Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary.', 'Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems.', 'Merchant Guild team', 'Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers.', 'Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling.', 'Our Perks', '5+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer.', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Required Qualifications', ' Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling. Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews. Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary. Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows. Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting. Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers. ', 'Responsibilities']
