Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals. Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies. Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems. ', 'Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews.', ' Knowledge of artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc. ', 'Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting.', 'Senior Software Engineer (Gameplay / Gameplay Tools) on the Merchant Guild team', 'Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary.', 'Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems.', 'Merchant Guild team', 'Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers.', 'Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals.', 'Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies.', 'Knowledge of artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc.', 'Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows.', 'Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling.', 'Our Perks', '5+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer.', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Required Qualifications', ' Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling. Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews. Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary. Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows. Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting. Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers. ', 'Responsibilities']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Tools) - League of Legends, Personalization
job_text: ['', 'Understand artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc.', 'Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews.', 'Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling', ' 8+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer. Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus. Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals. Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies. Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems. ', ' Understand artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc. ', 'Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems.', '8+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer.', 'Senior Software Engineer on the League of Legends Personalization team', 'Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus.', 'Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary, and build and support specific art outsourcing tools and needs.', 'Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers', 'Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals.', 'Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies.', 'Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows.', 'Our Perks', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Required Qualifications', ' Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews. Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary, and build and support specific art outsourcing tools and needs. Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows. job_text: ['', ' Identify, prioritize, and implement new game systems and engine features, as well as performance improvements to existing game engine and rendering features Collaborate with discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve workflows while supporting in-game performance goals Reduce ambiguity in a problem space through technical discovery and prototyping Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation for relevant systems Form relationships with content creators Influence software engineering best practices within the team, including design reviews, coding standards, code reviews, tools improvements, source control management, and test/build/deploy processes Develop sustainable solutions, improving the engine and leaving it better than you found it ', 'Expertise in C++', 'Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines', " 8+ years game industry or relevant engineering experience Expertise in C++ Expertise in game rendering and engine performance profiling Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment  Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines Familiarity with iterative development methodologies like Scrum, Agile or equivalent experience Familiarity with game engine tools, workflows and content pipelines Desired Qualifications Mobile or multi-platform performance profiling a bonus Our PerksWe offer medical, dental, and vision plans that cover you, your spouse/domestic partner, and children. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles' Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Expertise with one or more server-side development stacks (C/C++, C#, Java)', 'Working with globally dispersed engineering teams', ' Set the technical direction and standards for your team Lead and contribute to technical design and implementation, using your broad knowledge to guide tough technical decision-making Manage the team’s process for delivering high-quality experiences to players, lifting the expertise and skills of people around you Have a deep hands-on understanding of, and be accountable for, the quality and maintainability of your team’s code-base Drive collaboration and alignment with various internal and globally dispersed teams Some amount of travel required (~1 week every 8 weeks) ', 'Lead and contribute to technical design and implementation, using your broad knowledge to guide tough technical decision-making', '8+ years of experience in Software Engineering, with broad theoretical knowledge and practical application of Software and SRE principles to global-scale distributed systems', 'Experience as a Technical Leader with the ability to set technical vision', ' Experience with Unity and mobile device games Experience shipping cross platform console games (XBox, PS, Switch) Mandarin language fluency would be great Working with globally dispersed engineering teams ', 'Our Perks', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Required Qualifications', 'Experience with Unity and mobile device games', 'Responsibilities']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Tools) - League of Legends, Personalization
job_text: ['', 'Understand artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc.', 'Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews.', 'Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling', ' 8+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer. Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus. Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals. Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies. Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems. ', ' Understand artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc. ', 'Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems.', '8+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer.', 'Senior Software Engineer on the League of Legends Personalization team', 'Expertise in C++ and Python. job_text: ['', ' Identify, prioritize, and implement new game systems and engine features, as well as performance improvements to existing game engine and rendering features Collaborate with discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve workflows while supporting in-game performance goals Reduce ambiguity in a problem space through technical discovery and prototyping Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation for relevant systems Form relationships with content creators Influence software engineering best practices within the team, including design reviews, coding standards, code reviews, tools improvements, source control management, and test/build/deploy processes Develop sustainable solutions, improving the engine and leaving it better than you found it ', 'Expertise in C++', 'Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines', " 8+ years game industry or relevant engineering experience Expertise in C++ Expertise in game rendering and engine performance profiling Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment  Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines Familiarity with iterative development methodologies like Scrum, Agile or equivalent experience Familiarity with game engine tools, workflows and content pipelines Desired Qualifications Mobile or multi-platform performance profiling a bonus Our PerksWe offer medical, dental, and vision plans that cover you, your spouse/domestic partner, and children. job_title: Staff Software Engineer - Teamfight Tactics
job_text: ['', ' Identify, prioritize, and implement new game systems and engine features, as well as performance improvements to existing game engine and rendering features Collaborate with discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve workflows while supporting in-game performance goals Reduce ambiguity in a problem space through technical discovery and prototyping Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation for relevant systems Form relationships with content creators Influence software engineering best practices within the team, including design reviews, coding standards, code reviews, tools improvements, source control management, and test/build/deploy processes Develop sustainable solutions, improving the engine and leaving it better than you found it ', 'Expertise in C++', 'Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines', " 8+ years game industry or relevant engineering experience Expertise in C++ Expertise in game rendering and engine performance profiling Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment  Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines Familiarity with iterative development methodologies like Scrum, Agile or equivalent experience Familiarity with game engine tools, workflows and content pipelines Desired Qualifications Mobile or multi-platform performance profiling a bonus Our PerksWe offer medical, dental, and vision plans that cover you, your spouse/domestic partner, and children. Life insurance, parental leave, plus short-term and long-term disability coverage are also available. Riot will support your retirement benefits with a company match, and double down on your donations of time and money to non-profit charitable organizations. Balance between work and personal life is encouraged with open paid time off, and a play fund so you can broaden and deepen your personal relationship with games.===It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Reverse engineer exploits and software used to cheat, bot or boost in game experience  Help create the methodology for how Riot improves the competitive ecosystem Partner with product teams and security leadership throughout Anti-Cheat incidents Improve Riot's security posture by ensuring proper remediation, eradication and lessons learned are rolled back into day to day operations Develop relationships with engineering teams to understand their security needs Stay aware of new exploits and tech to stay one step ahead in the cheating arms race  ", "Improve Riot's security posture by ensuring proper remediation, eradication and lessons learned are rolled back into day to day operations", ' Knowledge of Windows internals and the kernel. job_title: Staff Software Engineer - Teamfight Tactics
job_text: ['', ' Identify, prioritize, and implement new game systems and engine features, as well as performance improvements to existing game engine and rendering features Collaborate with discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve workflows while supporting in-game performance goals Reduce ambiguity in a problem space through technical discovery and prototyping Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation for relevant systems Form relationships with content creators Influence software engineering best practices within the team, including design reviews, coding standards, code reviews, tools improvements, source control management, and test/build/deploy processes Develop sustainable solutions, improving the engine and leaving it better than you found it ', 'Expertise in C++', 'Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines', " 8+ years game industry or relevant engineering experience Expertise in C++ Expertise in game rendering and engine performance profiling Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment  Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines Familiarity with iterative development methodologies like Scrum, Agile or equivalent experience Familiarity with game engine tools, workflows and content pipelines Desired Qualifications Mobile or multi-platform performance profiling a bonus Our PerksWe offer medical, dental, and vision plans that cover you, your spouse/domestic partner, and children. Life insurance, parental leave, plus short-term and long-term disability coverage are also available. Riot will support your retirement benefits with a company match, and double down on your donations of time and money to non-profit charitable organizations. Balance between work and personal life is encouraged with open paid time off, and a play fund so you can broaden and deepen your personal relationship with games.===It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. job_text: ['', ' Identify, prioritize, and implement new game systems and engine features, as well as performance improvements to existing game engine and rendering features Collaborate with discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve workflows while supporting in-game performance goals Reduce ambiguity in a problem space through technical discovery and prototyping Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation for relevant systems Form relationships with content creators Influence software engineering best practices within the team, including design reviews, coding standards, code reviews, tools improvements, source control management, and test/build/deploy processes Develop sustainable solutions, improving the engine and leaving it better than you found it ', 'Expertise in C++', 'Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines', " 8+ years game industry or relevant engineering experience Expertise in C++ Expertise in game rendering and engine performance profiling Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment  Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines Familiarity with iterative development methodologies like Scrum, Agile or equivalent experience Familiarity with game engine tools, workflows and content pipelines Desired Qualifications Mobile or multi-platform performance profiling a bonus Our PerksWe offer medical, dental, and vision plans that cover you, your spouse/domestic partner, and children. job_title: Staff Software Engineer - League of Legends, Content Efficiency
job_text: ['', '2+ years of experience in the video game industry that includes working within multiple game development pipelines (animation, VFX, environment, etc) and a portfolio of successfully delivered games', 'Perks', 'Collaboration with multidisciplinary teams to ensure features delivered exceed expectations from multiple dimensions (code quality, extensibility, modularity, scalability, security, operational concerns, and industry standards/trends)', 'Setting the tone for, contributing to, and defining technical discussions/designs that your team is accountable for', 'Staff Software Engineer on the Content Efficiency Team', 'You have a strong history of mentoring others in both soft and hard skills', 'Maintain a sense of code ownership that includes developing/testing/deploying/maintaining frameworks, platforms, and tools', ' 8+ years of deep hands-on experiences with compiled programming languages (C/C++, Java, Go, or C#) Experience with C/C++ that spans various use-cases and platforms. Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment Proven record of delivering organizational/customer value that has span multiple years  Championed software development best practices within your organization that includes design/code reviews, coding standards, source control management, testing, delivery performance, scalability, and maintainability You have a strong history of mentoring others in both soft and hard skills Experience with interpreted languages like Python, JavaScript, or Ruby  ', '8+ years of deep hands-on experiences with compiled programming languages (C/C++, Java, Go, or C#)', 'Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment', 'Experience with interpreted languages like Python, JavaScript, or Ruby ', " Collaboration with multidisciplinary teams to ensure features delivered exceed expectations from multiple dimensions (code quality, extensibility, modularity, scalability, security, operational concerns, and industry standards/trends) Work closely and align with different partners that span across multiple teams to ensure we’re delivering awesome features that will excite them Setting the tone for, contributing to, and defining technical discussions/designs that your team is accountable for Maintain a sense of code ownership that includes developing/testing/deploying/maintaining frameworks, platforms, and tools Mentorship. You help Rioters develop the tools and creative atmosphere to shine, but ultimately hold them accountable for making smart calls and delivering player value Participate in the team's support rotation ", ' 2+ years of experience in the video game industry that includes working within multiple game development pipelines (animation, VFX, environment, etc) and a portfolio of successfully delivered games ', 'Championed software development best practices within your organization that includes design/code reviews, coding standards, source control management, testing, delivery performance, scalability, and maintainability', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. job_title: Data Scientist, Peacock
job_text: ['', 'Country', 'Career Level', ' Exhibit a bias for getting the job done', ' Experience in data processing including SQL and PySpark.', ' Build recommendation engines and other analytical models using statistical, machine learning and data mining methodologies. ', ' Apply cleansing, discretization, imputation, selection, generalization etc. to create high quality features for the modeling process. ', ' Experience with multi-billion record datasets.', ' Experience building streaming data pipelines using Kafka, Spark or Flink', 'Sub-Business', ' Work on improving the codebase and machine learning lifecycle infrastructure. Have active participation in all aspects of the team work. ', 'About Us', ' Build recommendation engines and other analytical models using statistical, machine learning and data mining methodologies.  Apply cleansing, discretization, imputation, selection, generalization etc. to create high quality features for the modeling process.  Use big data, relational and non-relational data sources to access data at the appropriate level of granularity for the needs of specific analytical projects. Maintains up to date knowledge of the relevant data set structures, access levels and ownership information.  Collaborate with engineering teams to build real-time and automated batch implementations of the data science solutions.  Work on improving the codebase and machine learning lifecycle infrastructure. Have active participation in all aspects of the team work. ', ' Experience with reinforcement learning based systems.', 'Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To', ' Experience with television ratings and digital measurement tools (Nielsen, Rentrak, ComScore etc.)', ' Hands on experience in statistical methods and machine learning with special emphasis on the advanced algorithms like neural networks, SVM, random forests, bagging, gradient boosting machines, k-means++, deep learning or reinforcement learning.', 'Qualifications/Requirements', ' Pride and ownership in your work and confident representation of your team to other parts of NBCUniversal', ' Bachelor’s or advanced degree with specialization in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Economics, Mathematics, Operations Research or another quantitative field or equivalent.', 'Desired Characteristics', 'State/Province', ' Experience with data visualization tools and techniques', ' Use big data, relational and non-relational data sources to access data at the appropriate level of granularity for the needs of specific analytical projects. Maintains up to date knowledge of the relevant data set structures, access levels and ownership information. ', 'Data Scientist, Peacock', ' Team oriented and collaborative approach with a demonstrated aptitude and willingness to learn new methods and tools', ' Knowledge of enterprise-level digital analytics platforms (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, etc.)', ' Strong knowledge of statistical and programming languages such as R, Python, Julia, Java, Scala or similar.', 'Position Overview', ' Experience implementing scalable, distributed, and highly available systems using Google Cloud or similar cloud platform.', ' Experience with large-scale video assets', ' Collaborate with engineering teams to build real-time and automated batch implementations of the data science solutions. ', 'Notices', ' 1+ years of combined experience in advanced analytics in the industry or research.', 'City', ' Strong knowledge of deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow or PyTorch.', ' Working experience with deep learning, particularly in the areas such as NLP, adversarial learning, autoencoders, wide & deep learning, and computer vision', ' Working experience with commercial recommender systems or a lead role in advanced research recommender system project.', 'Responsibilities']

job_text: ['', '2+ years of experience in the video game industry that includes working within multiple game development pipelines (animation, VFX, environment, etc) and a portfolio of successfully delivered games', 'Perks', 'Collaboration with multidisciplinary teams to ensure features delivered exceed expectations from multiple dimensions (code quality, extensibility, modularity, scalability, security, operational concerns, and industry standards/trends)', 'Setting the tone for, contributing to, and defining technical discussions/designs that your team is accountable for', 'Staff Software Engineer on the Content Efficiency Team', 'You have a strong history of mentoring others in both soft and hard skills', 'Maintain a sense of code ownership that includes developing/testing/deploying/maintaining frameworks, platforms, and tools', ' 8+ years of deep hands-on experiences with compiled programming languages (C/C++, Java, Go, or C#) Experience with C/C++ that spans various use-cases and platforms. You help Rioters develop the tools and creative atmosphere to shine, but ultimately hold them accountable for making smart calls and delivering player value Participate in the team's support rotation ", ' 2+ years of experience in the video game industry that includes working within multiple game development pipelines (animation, VFX, environment, etc) and a portfolio of successfully delivered games ', 'Championed software development best practices within your organization that includes design/code reviews, coding standards, source control management, testing, delivery performance, scalability, and maintainability', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. job_title: Data Scientist, Peacock
job_text: ['', 'Country', 'Career Level', ' Exhibit a bias for getting the job done', ' Experience in data processing including SQL and PySpark.', ' Build recommendation engines and other analytical models using statistical, machine learning and data mining methodologies. ', ' Apply cleansing, discretization, imputation, selection, generalization etc. to create high quality features for the modeling process. ', ' Experience with multi-billion record datasets.', ' Experience building streaming data pipelines using Kafka, Spark or Flink', 'Sub-Business', ' Work on improving the codebase and machine learning lifecycle infrastructure. Have active participation in all aspects of the team work. ', 'About Us', ' Build recommendation engines and other analytical models using statistical, machine learning and data mining methodologies.  Apply cleansing, discretization, imputation, selection, generalization etc. to create high quality features for the modeling process.  Use big data, relational and non-relational data sources to access data at the appropriate level of granularity for the needs of specific analytical projects. Maintains up to date knowledge of the relevant data set structures, access levels and ownership information.  Collaborate with engineering teams to build real-time and automated batch implementations of the data science solutions.  Work on improving the codebase and machine learning lifecycle infrastructure. Have active participation in all aspects of the team work. ', ' Experience with reinforcement learning based systems.', 'Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To', ' Experience with television ratings and digital measurement tools (Nielsen, Rentrak, ComScore etc.)', ' Hands on experience in statistical methods and machine learning with special emphasis on the advanced algorithms like neural networks, SVM, random forests, bagging, gradient boosting machines, k-means++, deep learning or reinforcement learning.', 'Qualifications/Requirements', ' Pride and ownership in your work and confident representation of your team to other parts of NBCUniversal', ' Bachelor’s or advanced degree with specialization in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Economics, Mathematics, Operations Research or another quantitative field or equivalent.', 'Desired Characteristics', 'State/Province', ' Experience with data visualization tools and techniques', ' Use big data, relational and non-relational data sources to access data at the appropriate level of granularity for the needs of specific analytical projects. Maintains up to date knowledge of the relevant data set structures, access levels and ownership information. ', 'Data Scientist, Peacock', ' Team oriented and collaborative approach with a demonstrated aptitude and willingness to learn new methods and tools', ' Knowledge of enterprise-level digital analytics platforms (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, etc.)', ' Strong knowledge of statistical and programming languages such as R, Python, Julia, Java, Scala or similar.', 'Position Overview', ' Experience implementing scalable, distributed, and highly available systems using Google Cloud or similar cloud platform.', ' Experience with large-scale video assets', ' Collaborate with engineering teams to build real-time and automated batch implementations of the data science solutions. ', 'Notices', ' 1+ years of combined experience in advanced analytics in the industry or research.', 'City', ' Strong knowledge of deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow or PyTorch.', ' Working experience with deep learning, particularly in the areas such as NLP, adversarial learning, autoencoders, wide & deep learning, and computer vision', ' Working experience with commercial recommender systems or a lead role in advanced research recommender system project.', 'Responsibilities']

Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals. Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies. Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems. ', 'Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews.', ' Knowledge of artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc. ', 'Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting.', 'Senior Software Engineer (Gameplay / Gameplay Tools) on the Merchant Guild team', 'Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary.', 'Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems.', 'Merchant Guild team', 'Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers.', 'Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals.', 'Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies.', 'Knowledge of artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc.', 'Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows.', 'Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling.', 'Our Perks', '5+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer.', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Required Qualifications', ' Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling. Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews. Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary. Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows. Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting. Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers. ', 'Responsibilities']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Tools) - League of Legends, Personalization
job_text: ['', 'Understand artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc.', 'Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews.', 'Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling', ' 8+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer. Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus. Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals. Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies. Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems. ', ' Understand artist tools such as Maya, PhotoShop, 3D Studio Max, Wwise etc. ', 'Experience with profiling and addressing performance and scale problems.', '8+ years of experience as a gameplay or game tools engineer.', 'Senior Software Engineer on the League of Legends Personalization team', 'Expertise in C++ and Python. Lua scripting experience is a bonus.', 'Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary, and build and support specific art outsourcing tools and needs.', 'Prototype and test new content features, and improve product visibility through monitoring and alerting', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Provide mentorship to technical artists and engineers', 'Experience with technical design, programming, and CS fundamentals.', 'Experience identifying inefficiencies in processes, tools, workflows and creating solutions to eliminate these inefficiencies.', 'Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows.', 'Our Perks', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Required Qualifications', ' Build features and improve the tools that raise the quality of League content. You will also enhance build and deployment tooling Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation, and perform code reviews. Support artists in their art workflows, collecting data to further improve the tools they are using, making recommendations and improvements where necessary, and build and support specific art outsourcing tools and needs. Collaborate with production and art discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve the content creation workflows. job_text: ['', ' Identify, prioritize, and implement new game systems and engine features, as well as performance improvements to existing game engine and rendering features Collaborate with discipline leads to develop long-term vision and strategies that improve workflows while supporting in-game performance goals Reduce ambiguity in a problem space through technical discovery and prototyping Lead architecture requirements, design, and implementation for relevant systems Form relationships with content creators Influence software engineering best practices within the team, including design reviews, coding standards, code reviews, tools improvements, source control management, and test/build/deploy processes Develop sustainable solutions, improving the engine and leaving it better than you found it ', 'Expertise in C++', 'Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines', " 8+ years game industry or relevant engineering experience Expertise in C++ Expertise in game rendering and engine performance profiling Have been responsible for driving the design and leading of development of large-sized efforts (6-month scope), including requirements gathering, planning, testing, and release or deployment  Collaborative mindset and experience working with others disciplines Familiarity with iterative development methodologies like Scrum, Agile or equivalent experience Familiarity with game engine tools, workflows and content pipelines Desired Qualifications Mobile or multi-platform performance profiling a bonus Our PerksWe offer medical, dental, and vision plans that cover you, your spouse/domestic partner, and children. job_title: Systems Sales Engineer - Enterprise Big Data - Data Warehouse - Linux Operating Systems
job_text: ['', ' Understanding of secure enterprise environments.', ' Experience debugging software or hardware systems.', ' Great team excited about the company and what we build together.', 'System Sales Engineer with Big Data and Data Warehouse experience to join exciting, growing St. Louis based company.', ' Strong programming capability in C, C++, Java, Python, or similar.', 'A Bit About Us', ' This role will also be responsible for helping customers learn how to use company products, which includes conducting training sessions and walk-throughs, helping improve documentation, etc.', ' BS or better in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent. 2 – 5 years of experience working with customers supporting technical sales. Passion for solving customer problems and describing reference architectures for our products.', ' Knowledge of documentation and diagramming tools (e.g., Visio, PowerPoint, etc.).', ' Tremendous impact and growth opportunities within the company.', ' Familiarity with Linux operating systems and tools.', ' Although we’re not looking for a developer, candidates must have a level of coding proficiency in a rich language (C/++, Java, Python, etc.) and be comfortable using debugging tools like GDB.', ' Strong presentation and conversational skills.', ' BS or better in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent.', ' Work closely with the product development team to describe feature requests coming in from the field and to offer guidance in the design of new capabilities and usability features.', ' Effective scripting capabilities (bash, python, perl, etc.).', ' Ability to communicate effectively to both engineers and non-technical professionals.', 'Requirements', ' Great health and dental benefits for employees and their dependents. job_title: Protective Systems System Engineer E3 with Security Clearance
job_text: ['', ' Work safely themselves and help their teammates work safely.', ' Must have the ability to communicate in English, both verbal and written in an effective manner.', " Help the organization maintain a safe and healthy workplace. Purpose and Scope Mechanical or Electrical System Engineering position to perform a variety of fire alarm and fire suppression system engineering assignments in project development, design, operations, installation, and maintenance of systems that are located at NASA's Kennedy Space Center, Florida. The specific types of facilities in which these systems are located include space flight hardware processing facilities, launch pad support facilities and other types of administrative and industrial facilities. Job Duties and Essential Responsibilities System Specific Knowledgeable of fire alarm and fire suppression system design, operation and maintenance as well as NFPA code requirements. Maintenance Revise and add new asset information in Maximo database for assigned equipment per MAR (Maintenance Action Request) process. Develop and maintain job plans and PMs for assigned equipment in accordance with EGS Operations and industry standard requirements. Address and justify preventive maintenance deferrals of assigned equipment. Conduct site visits to investigate system problems, propose solutions and provide recommendations to restore systems. Support shop technicians in troubleshooting issues related to assigned equipment as needed. Provide technical expertise for technical anomalies as they arise. Resolve and document failure anomalies regarding assigned equipment. Prepare Technical Anomaly reports and presentations documenting problems, concerns and resolutions for assigned equipment to the Engineering Review Board. Integrated Ops Support Coordinate NASA and customer related mission activities to support the EGS customer launch schedule to include: launch site test plan development and coordination with EGS Solumina documents, mission support training certifications and Launch Control Center console test support certifications. Participate in console operation during test and launch operations as needed for assigned systems supporting launch and processing facilities and as necessary for other Spaceport Users test and launch operations where assigned systems/equipment are required to support. Readiness Provide input to and actively participate in applicable System Health and Readiness Program (SHARP) teams. Develop and present or represent mission related presentations to the NASA and/or EGS customer as required to present support readiness or failure concerns. Perform readiness assessments of assigned equipment and systems. Project Support Coordinate and work closely with requester, customers, other engineering, logistics, financial, and program management disciplines to define system specifications and requirements. Direct interface and liaison with internal and external customers at all levels from concept to final design and commissioning activities, design reviews and technical working group meetings to comply with requirements and specifications. Support development of technical proposals, statements of work and/or provide comments on the technical content and level of effort of the proposed scope of work. Develop task order requirements to NASA to complete Operations & Maintenance Documentation (OMD) updates per specific, contracted timeframes. OMD updates could be on drawings or job plans for assigned equipment/systems. Coordinate and communicate effectively with CAD drafters, Design Engineers, or shop personnel by written or verbal means. Other Be able to interpret and provide guidance for assigned equipment using single line and schematic drawings. Develop, maintain and produce technical documentation and system/subsystem specifications. Verify and comply with engineering documentation standards and test procedures. Conduct site visits, experimental investigations and analyze engineering problems, propose solutions and alternatives, and provide recommendations. Assess assigned systems and equipment for necessary upgrades to meet new code requirements, or enhance operation Perform all other position related duties as assigned or requested. Education and Experience Requirements Bachelor's Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering, or related engineering field and 8+ years of job-related experience or equivalent. Good communication and analytical skills. Preferred Qualifications: NICET Level II certification in Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems or Inspection and Testing of Water Based Systems or Special Hazard Systems is preferred. NFPA certification as a Certified Fire Protection Specialist or Certified Fire Inspector I or II or Certified Fire Plan Examiner is preferred. May require some limited travel. May require the ability to pass and maintain a Security Clearance. Other Requirements: * Must be able to obtain and maintain required government clearances/badges as required by program and position.", ' Interact professionally with other employees, customers, and suppliers.', " Must have and maintain a valid driver's license. Work Environment, Physical Demands, and Mental Demands: This position involves work typical of an office environment with no unusual hazards; occasional lifting to 20 pounds; constant sitting with use of computer terminal; constant use of sight abilities while reviewing documents; constant use of speech/hearing abilities for communication; constant mental alertness; must possess planning/organizing skills and must be able to work under deadlines. Field work will consist primarily of site walk downs in support of design projects and system trouble shooting Site hazard training and Personal Protective Equipment are provided. Other Responsibilities: * Safety - PSP enforces a safety culture whereby all employees have the responsibility for continuously developing and maintaining a safe work environment. As appropriate, each employee is responsible for completing all training requirements and fulfilling all self-aid/buddy aid responsibilities, participating in emergency response tasks and serving on safety committees and teams. * Quality - Quality is the foundation for the management of our business and the keystone to our goal of customer satisfaction. It is our policy to consistently provide services that meet customer expectations. Accordingly, each employee must conform to the PSP Quality Policy and carry out job activities in compliance with applicable PSP Quality System documents and customer contracts. Each employee must read and understand his/her Quality Management and Customer Satisfaction responsibilities. * Procedure Compliance - Each employee must read, understand and implement the general and specific operational, safety, quality and environmental requirements of all plans, procedures and policies pertaining to their job. PAE is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. Our hiring practices provide equal opportunity for employment without regard to race, religion, color, sex, gender, national origin, age, United States military veteran's status, ancestry, sexual orientation, marital status, family structure, medical condition including genetic characteristics or information, veteran status, or mental or physical disability so long as the essential functions of the job can be performed with or without reasonable accommodation, or any other protected category under federal, state, or local law. EEO is the Law Poster EEO is the Law Poster Supplement", ' Work independently while understanding the necessity for communicating and coordinating work efforts with other employees and organizations.', ' Assist supervisors and managers in identifying and mitigating potentially hazardous conditions.']

Assess assigned systems and equipment for necessary upgrades to meet new code requirements, or enhance operation Perform all other position related duties as assigned or requested. Education and Experience Requirements Bachelor's Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering, or related engineering field and 2+ years of job-related experience or equivalent. Good communication and analytical skills. Preferred Qualifications: May require some limited travel. May require the ability to pass and maintain a Security Clearance. Other Requirements: * Must be able to obtain and maintain required government clearances/badges as required by program and position.", ' Must have the ability to communicate in English, both verbal and written in an effective manner.', ' Interact professionally with other employees, customers, and suppliers.', " Must have and maintain a valid driver's license. Work Environment, Physical Demands, and Mental Demands: This position involves work typical of an office environment with no unusual hazards; occasional lifting to 20 pounds; constant sitting with use of computer terminal; constant use of sight abilities while reviewing documents; constant use of speech/hearing abilities for communication; constant mental alertness; must possess planning/organizing skills and must be able to work under deadlines. Field work will consist primarily of site walk downs in support of design projects and system trouble shooting Site hazard training and Personal Protective Equipment are provided. Other Responsibilities: * Safety - PSP enforces a safety culture whereby all employees have the responsibility for continuously developing and maintaining a safe work environment. As appropriate, each employee is responsible for completing all training requirements and fulfilling all self-aid/buddy aid responsibilities, participating in emergency response tasks and serving on safety committees and teams. * Quality - Quality is the foundation for the management of our business and the keystone to our goal of customer satisfaction. It is our policy to consistently provide services that meet customer expectations. Accordingly, each employee must conform to the PSP Quality Policy and carry out job activities in compliance with applicable PSP Quality System documents and customer contracts. Each employee must read and understand his/her Quality Management and Customer Satisfaction responsibilities. * Procedure Compliance - Each employee must read, understand and implement the general and specific operational, safety, quality and environmental requirements of all plans, procedures and policies pertaining to their job.
